column2: At Pinnove you will have the unique opportunity to work on stimulating projects and develop your skills. Our culture is competitive, yet caring, you'll be supported, challenged, listened to and intellectually stimulated. We will bring out the best in you.    In an ever -changing world, innovation is the dynamic guiding principle. It reminds us that we must always prepare for tomorrow. This is why Pinnoves people management philosophy recognizes those who have a true passion for innovation and scientific progress. We value curiosity for the major technological advances and the new challenges faced by society.   Were looking for people who have an unusual blend of passion, dedication, and energy. They are creative and insightful, tenacious problem solvers and enjoy working in teams. We are looking for talented people who will play a part in developing Pinnoves next breakthrough ideas.   Job Responsibilities  Be ready to roll up your sleeves and produce well designed and tested production quality code.  Eager to mentor and learn from small team of developers.  Accountable for complete development process; design, development, testing, and deployment.  Implementation of highly available and scalable services.  Participate in design and code reviews to help increase the quality of our products and services.  Supporting existing systems while making enhancements towards future architecture.  Pick best technology for situation. The ability to tell the difference between cool and useful.  Interact with business units effectively regarding features and specifications.  Comprehensive knowledge of SQL and database design.  Self -motivated, driven and goal oriented. Qualifications  5+ years of current professional experience working with Java  Proven high level of expertise in Java and related technology stacks  Proven proficiency in API development (REST and SOAP)  BS or MS in Computer Science or equivalent  Experience working in a metrics driven environment is a plus  Cloud Computing Experience (e.g AWS, Azure) is a plus Key Responsibilities  Develop large scale RESTful Web Services in Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) environment  Desire to have full ownership of the entire SDLC from conception to post -mortem  Mentor junior developers to grow them to similar levels of technical expertise  Collaborate with cross -functional teams - business stakeholders, engineers, program management, project management, etc. - to produce the best solutions possible  Anticipate system /application challenges and proposes solutions for the same  Contribute to story sizing and work estimates for implementation, validation, delivery and documentation  Review user stories to ensure a quality user experience, well -defined acceptance criteria and thorough test coverage  Participate in design and code review to ensure quality and testability of feature code  Implement test automation to validate new and existing code  Adjust positively to quickly -changing priorities and shifting goals  Translate business issues to technical terms  Understand, leverage and applies best practices effectively  5+ years of current professional experience working with JavaScript  Proven high level of expertise in JavaScript, CSS and other UI development frameworks  Experience with AngularJS, ReactJS, or any similar framework must  Develop slick UI from scratch without much help from graphics designers or template writers  Ability to handle large amounts of data on client side to display and paginate  Develop responsive UI with modularized code that is compatible across browsers and devices  Desire to have full ownership of the entire SDLC from conception to post -mortem  Mentor junior developers to grow them to similar levels of technical expertise  Strive for continuous improvement of code quality and development practices  Collaborate with cross -functional teams - business stakeholders, engineers, program management, project management, etc. - to produce the best solutions possible  Anticipate system /application challenges and proposes solutions for the same  Contribute to story sizing and work estimates for implementation, validation, delivery and documentation  Review user stories to ensure a quality user experience, well -defined acceptance criteria and thorough test coverage  Participate in design and code review to ensure quality and testability of feature code  Implement test automation to validate new and existing code  Adjust positively to quickly -changing priorities and shifting goals  Translate business issues to technical terms  Understand, leverage and applies best practices effectively  1 2 years of experience with Microsoft TFS  Thorough understanding of SDLC  Developed CI /CD pipelines for Microsoft stack demonstrating solid understating of code repository, build, branch.  Ability to drive release process from, triage, bug -tracking and pushing teams for discipline in code -checkins, timely commits and code -quality.  3+ years of experience owning the build lifecycle of multiple webserver applications with regular updates and live operation  5+ years of experience with build and continuous integration tools (DevOps) with best practices  Experience with Jenkins, Python, MSBuild, and Powershell preferred  Excellent communication and organization skills.  Familiarity with agile development processes. Define release rhythms and schedules with milestones  Establish release process with necessary checks -points and responsible parties. Enforce checkpoint with accountability.  Support regular cadence of production updates and hotfixes for live service of multiple products across game platforms.  Monitor services and infrastructure health with polling systems, and alert on KPI metrics.  Work directly with talented engineers, QA testers, artists, and producers to ensure all release schedules stay coordinated and on time.  Triage and troubleshoot live issues to resolution with attention to detail and optimization.  Collaborate with and educate engineers on proper use of build and source control systems. Job Requirements  Must have at least 5 years of experience in writing solid code in PHP  Must have worked in core -php as well as any popular framework like CakePHP, Laravel, Zend  Must have experience developing web -services and multi -tenant service oriented products using PHP  Demonstrate solid understanding and has implemented module subscriptions, role based authorization and access control  Experience with Amazon Web Services a big plus  Experience developing large scale integrated applications with multi -tiered architectures.  Aware of modularized application development in products as well as service provider environment  Comfortable with different storage options sql, nosql, etc.  Solid understanding of platform and concepts like Threading, IPC, OO Patterns, TCP /IP, HTTP, DNS, Web Servers a strong plus  Knowledge of javascript, ajax, HTML, CSS required  Prior experience with media a plus  Experience with full life cycle of software product development  Strong Analytical skills to be able to take the problem to its conclusion  Strong communication skills.  Able to demonstrate working in team environment.  Must be self -starter and be able to enjoy learn and grow environment. Senior Graphics, UI and UX Designer - Nagpur Key Responsibilities  Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and engineers  Translate concepts into wireframes and mockups that lead to intuitive user experiences.  Facilitate clients product visions by researching, conceiving, wireframing, sketching, prototyping, and mocking up user experiences for digital products.  Design and deliver wireframes, user stories, user journeys, and mockups optimized for a wide range of devices and interfaces.  Identify design problems and devise elegant solutions. Expertise in software like Illustrator, Photoshop, CorelDraw, Flash is a must.  Ability to work with clients to understand detailed requirements and design complete user experiences that meet client needs and vision.  Extensive experience in using UX design best practices to design solutions, and a deep understanding of mobile -first and responsive design. Ability to clearly and effectively communicate design processes, ideas, and solutions to teams and clients.  A clear understanding of the importance of user -centered design.  Be excited about collaborating and communicating closely with teams and other stakeholders via a distributed model to regularly deliver design solutions for approval.  Be willing to help teammates, share knowledge and experience with them, and learn from them.  Be open to receiving feedback and constructive criticism.  Be passionate about all things UX and other areas of design and innovation. Research and showcase knowledge in the industrys latest trends and technologies. column2: Business Development Manager    Full Time    A talented and ambitious Business Development Manager is required to represent Qbytez to grow and establish new business and customers. As we continue to expend into the global marketplace with a focus on Destination Marketing, a highly driven and motivated Business Development Manager is required.     The successful candidate will have strong interpersonal and communication skills, with a focus on organization and enhanced multitasking abilities covering across both English and Middle East marketplaces. B2B sales, marketing and strategic analysis are important aspects of the position, along with exceptional negotiation skills and the ability to close deals.     Reporting the Global CEO, you will have relevant sales and marketing experience within the target marketplaces. This is a full-time position, with international travel required to fulfill the job role.         Essential:         Generate leads and keep in regular contact with existing prospects, whilst maintaining existing client accounts and driving their businesses forward         Present to senior decision makers within prospective and existing clients (MDs and CEOs)         Develop targeted long-term marketing and new business strategies to grow Qbytez s reputation and presence within the market         Work closely with senior management to refine how the business presents itself to fully explore and grow in new markets         Regularly reporting on performance of sales leads and marketing activities to senior management against set monthly targets and project budgets         Responsible for overseeing team members to deliver on agreed projects, on time and to budget         Research and analysis of industry trends and technology to identify key areas for expansion and development for new and existing business         Develop best in class client proposals, targeted pitch decks and other sales and marketing campaigns/activities as needed         Grow and maintain relationships with new and existing customers as the dedicated key contact for client accounts         Provide assistance and support in development of commercial sales contracts, adhering to law established rules and guidelines, in both Arabic and English         Assist the finance team in preparing taxation reports and annual taxation paperwork         Knowledgeable and abreast of the latest industry and best practice standards in marketing and social media           Desirable:         Proven working experience within Business Development or Marketing role with exceptional Project Management capabilities         Self-starter who is commercially minded, target-driven, process oriented and motivated         Proficient in English spoken and written forms         BA/B.Sc. in Marketing, Media and Communications or equivalent. A Master s degree in those fields is preferable.         Excellent communication, presentation and negotiation skills, particularly within the target marketplace         Exceptional attention to detail         You will have experience of building relationships with senior commercial and technical decision-makers and ideally possess strong personal contacts and relationships with key players         Excellent time management, an individual who thrives on working autonomously, but can also work well within a team environment         Experience with CRM systems and processes         Ability to quickly adapt and respond to changing situations, whilst remaining calm and composed under pressure         Strong understanding of client cultures to maintain and grow new and existing relationships with clients and prospects.         The ideal candidate will be determined, outgoing, positive, articulate and diplomatic           Why Choose Qbytez?         Develop your career with one of the leading companies in town         Work with some of the regions biggest brands         Develop your skill set in a challenging and rewarding environment with R&D time and personal development time         Budget towards books, training and personal development         Competitive salary, bonus and incentive schemes         Work in a friendly atmosphere where our team of experts is always ready to help         Regular social and training events         Cycle to work scheme         Hot drinks and filtered water         Work in a grade A environment located in Cyber Park, Kozhikode

column2: An estimator is a professional who is responsible for estimating the costs, resources, and time required for a project or task     Estimators work in various industries, including construction, manufacturing, engineering, and project management     Their primary goal is to provide accurate and detailed estimates to assist in decision-making, budgeting, and planning processes     The responsibilities of an estimator may vary depending on the industry and specific job requirements         However, common tasks and responsibilities include:         Project Analysis: Analyzing project requirements, specifications, and scope to understand the key components and deliverables of the project     This involves reviewing project plans, drawings, and other relevant documentation     Cost Estimation: Calculating the costs associated with a project, including materials, labor, equipment, subcontractors, permits, and other expenses     Estimators utilize their industry knowledge, historical data, cost databases, and supplier quotes to determine accurate cost estimates     Quantity Takeoff: Quantifying the materials, resources, and quantities required for the project     This involves measuring and calculating the amounts of materials, such as concrete, steel, or lumber, needed for construction projects, or assessing the quantity of parts and components required for manufacturing projects     Pricing and Bidding: Developing pricing strategies and preparing competitive bids or proposals for potential clients or stakeholders     Estimators work closely with sales teams, project managers, and executives to ensure the bid is financially viable and aligned with the company's goals     Risk Assessment: Identifying and evaluating potential risks and uncertainties that may impact the project's cost, timeline, or resources     Estimators assess factors such as market conditions, regulatory requirements, labor availability, and project complexities to account for risks in the estimates     Cost Tracking and Control: Monitoring and tracking actual project costs throughout the project lifecycle, comparing them against the estimated costs     Estimators collaborate with project teams to analyze deviations and implement cost control measures when necessary     Vendor and Supplier Management: Collaborating with vendors, suppliers, and subcontractors to obtain accurate pricing, negotiate contracts, and ensure timely delivery of materials and services
column11: quality control, quantity measurement

column2: Role and Responsibilities   We are looking for an experienced Development Operations manager (DevOps) to join our growing organization and to help us manage our development team,  release updates on time and automate the software development life- cycle. A keen attention to detail,  problem- solving abilities,  and a curiosity to learn are essential.   The DevOps Manager responsibilities include deploying product updates,  identifying production issues and implementing integrations that meet customer needs. If you have a solid background in any of these,  we would like to meet you. In addition,  this position performs the following roles:    Work directly with the Development team and management to ensure system integrity    Manage the development,  test and beta environments    Build and test automation tools for infrastructure provisioning    Handle code deployments in all environments    Brainstorm for new ideas and ways to improvement development delivery    Build,  maintain,  and monitor configuration standards    Manage CI and CD tools with team    Document and design various processes; update existing processes    Improve infrastructure development and application development    Implement integrations requested by customers    Deploy updates and fixes    Provide Level 3 technical support    Build tools to reduce occurrences of errors and improve customer experience    Investigate and resolve technical issues    Develop scripts to automate visualization    Design procedures for system troubleshooting and maintenance    Assist in managing the development team tickets and timelines   Skills and Experience    Puppet,  Ansible,  Chef,  Terraform,  etc.    Shell scripting and command line on Windows and/ or Linux (basic knowledge required)    MySQL (basic knowledge required)    Git and Git branches (basic knowledge required)    Agile development   The ability to multitask,  prioritize,  and manage time efficiently is important.   Qualifications Sought    A Bachelor s Degree is required. Computer Science preferred but not a requirement.    A Master s Degree is a huge bonus    Minimum 2 years previous experience with development operations,  software development or server administration will be required.   What we are looking for    Curiosity to constantly learn more    Good communication skills    Sharp eye for detail    A strong sense of loyalty to the company    Commitment and dedication to get the work done   The work environment    An incredible team of smart and supportive people    Small,  agile and dynamic team that works fast    Opportunity to wear multiple hats and juggle multiple roles    Be rewarded with a very competitive package    Plenty of opportunities to learn. column2: PM Role for E-governance Projects (IT Infrastructure) Location: Anywhere in India. Permanent Employment Full time. No.of Positions:6 Yrs of Experience: 6 - 10  Roles and Responsibility Monitoring Application Development and Implementation. Advising Department on adequacy of internal controls and audit systems in operations by bench marking with best practices. Providing inputs to Department on processes,  business rule formulations etc,  during the application development phase. Monitoring Implementation of IT system during all phases. Contribute to production readiness/ hand-off review before go-live Advising Department on IT and business architecture,  developed by the IA,  its suitability to the needs/ requirements. Vetting quality and suitability of all deliverables of application development submitted by IA,  supporting Department in sign-off on various deliverables. Supporting Department in conducting user acceptance testing and quality audits and other associated activities. Monitoring IT infrastructure & Services delivery performance Development of necessary templates for monitoring SLAs and expected performance requirements of the Application,  platform and Network. Monitoring operations and service delivery,  analysis of service delivery data and IT infrastructure performance. Advising Department on matters relating to compliance with SLA parameters and expected performance requirements. Escalation of SLA reports and associated issues,  resolution methods to designated officials of Department. Key Stakeholder Management Planning key stakeholder feedback surveys to understand effectiveness of service delivery. Design of stakeholder feedback forms and conducting surveys to capture response on services,  service levels,  availability of infrastructure and grievance redressal status etc. Conducting key Stakeholder feedback surveys at various locations and on a sample basis as required by Department. Assessing changes required in applications,  service delivery and subsequent changes. Training and Knowledge management Preparation & Implementation of a detailed training plan. Monitoring of effectiveness of training delivered to Department and key stakeholders. Contract and relationship management Assist the department in bid management for selection of IA. column2: We have an exciting opportunity for the post Assistant Manager - Financial Planning in our organisation BBW Business Services Pvt Ltd  BBW Business Services Pvt Ltd (Wholly owned KPO division of Viden Group Pty Ltd). Headquartered in Brisbane (Australia) since 1910 ,  we provide financial services to clients in Australia in the areas of accounting ,  Book keepings ,  taxation and audit. We have offices in New Delhi and Australia.  We provide many benefits to our employees which includes early shift timings from 7am - 4 pm ,  5 day working ,  Mediclaim Insurance and an excellent chance to be an exciting career in the fastest growing KPO in outsourcing industry.   Job Location: Laxmi Nagar ,  New Delhi  Shift Timings: 7 am to 4 pm (This may extend depending on client requirements)  JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:    Desire to work in Australian Corporate laws (including but not limited to set up of company ,  share transfer ,  preparation of Minutes ,  Directorship Change etc.)  Assist in Financial Planning matterswhich includes preparation of Statement of Accounts (SOAs) ,  financial statements for Australian clients  Formulating Financial Planning strategies and analyzing and presenting to client and onshore Australia Team  Work extensively with the onshore stakeholders to identify and improve current processes systems related to Financial Planning and Australian Legal framework  Run lead the process performance in line with the agreed service level agreements (SLAs) and targets.  Drive process efficiency and consistency.   DESIRED CANDIDATE PROFILE:     Experience in Financial Planning will be preferred  Good Communication skills  People Management skills are essential  Target Oriented and ability to handle pressure  He  /  she should have good English communication skills (sufficient to adequately communicate with our Australian staff via Skype when required) and advanced written English skills  He  /  she would keep certain financial and administrative records  He  /  She should have high standard of computer literacy including MS Excel ,  MS Word etc
column11: Business services, Administration, Service level, Finance, Financial planning, KPO, Outsourcing, Taxation, Financial services, Auditing

column2: Commissioning Engineer           Changodar, Ahmedabad     Graduate with 3-4 yrs of experience in installation & commissioning of Gas & Oil fired Galvanizing Furnaces. Should have worked in OEM/Capital goods/Industrial Machinery. Excellent written & spoken communication skills.       Required Skills         Applicant must have a good working knowledge of hot water boilers, burners (gas, oil & combination), fuel & air settings associated controls and electrical circuits and combustion.         Must be able to troubleshoot and perform start-up and combustion tests.         Knowledge of stack parameter settings for oxygen, carbon dioxide, excess air and efficiency         Knowledge of various field instruments such as flame controls, thermocouples, pressure switches, flow meters, actuators, level switches etc         Knowledge of PLC panel maintenance and troubleshooting.         OEM experience will be preferred         Responsibilities and Duties         Commissioning, tuning and troubleshooting of furnaces with oil and gas burners.         Mostly combustion and commissioning work.         After sales service         New product development.       Job Type: Full-time       Qualification and Experience:         BE/Diploma in Engineering.         Minimum experience of 3 to 4 years with burner tuning and commissioning experience.         Good communication skills.         Good knowledge of MS office tools such as MS Word, Excel etc.
column11: After sales service, Excel, OEM, MS Office tools, Capital goods, MS Word, New product development, PLC panel, Troubleshooting, Industrial machinery

column2: Role & responsibilities     This is a full-time on-site role as a State Sales Head at Blowhot India located in the Greater Delhi Area. The State Sales Head will be responsible for managing sales operations and driving business growth in the state. This includes overseeing the sales team, developing sales strategies, managing key accounts, and achieving sales targets. The State Sales Head will also be responsible for market analysis, competitor analysis, and building strong customer relationships. Analytical Skills, Sales, and Sales Management Proven experience in account management and team management Strong leadership and decision-making abilities Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Ability to build and maintain relationships with key clients Understanding of the kitchen appliances industry Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or relevant field Experience in the kitchen appliances industry is a plus Preferred candidate profile  Must be from kitchen Appliances Background Perks and benefits  Incentives+PF+gratuity

column1: Sr. Sales  Executives_ Farm Equipment-  Rotavator , Inter Cultivator
column2: Sales Managers/ Executives_ Agri Tools/ Farm Equipment Company for Himachal Pradesh, Jammu.   Should have experience in Rotavator, rotavator blades or intercultivator sales.   Comfortable to travel 18 days in a month for tours   If you are from Agri Tools/ Farm Equipment Company For , Please call us @ 7092689999 Or email your CV to jagannaath@kamms.net   Position Name: Sales Managers/ Sales Executives Position Type: Full time Job Location: Himachal Pradesh- Anywhere , Jammu (Base location can be anywhere in the respective states and we are hiring 2 candidates for each state)   We are on a mission to bring Farm Mechanization to every farm and to every farmer. We are Indias first Farm Mechanization B2B Marketplace, Knowledge-building platform and Supply Chain Solutions.   We cover all Agri Tools & Spares supporting the Entire Farming Cycle (Seedbed preparation, Sowing & plantation, Plant Cultivation, Harvesting and Threshing) We have the largest assortment of spare parts across the industry at one place. We provide spares of all machines and across all categories.  We hosts the most extensive and robust network of vendors across the agriculture sector in India. We partner with verified OEM and OES to provide quality spares at the fastest turnaround time  Position Roles and Responsibilities   We are looking for high-performing Sales Executives with experience in rural sales and marketing. You will be responsible for maximizing our sales team potential, travel to different places for dealer development, product demonstrations, customer support etc. The candidate must be familiar with agriculture machineries and rural market and should be comfortable to travel.  Responsibilities include:  1. Develop and execute on a sales plan for the assigned territory  2. Ability to build a team, train them and manage their performance in line with the planned targets   3. Identify new dealers & visiting dealers regularly to build a strong relationship and grow revenues  4. Demonstrate knowledge of after sales product issues and spare parts for various agricultural equipment   5. Develop business intelligence on various types of Agri equipment and technology selling in the market; on new products being launched and on prospects.  6. Understand crop seasons and farmer requirements in the respective territory.   7. Promote, handhold & convert dealers to digital approaches of doing business   8. Regular reporting on activities & developments in your territory to the assigned manager   9. Adhering to timelines and commitment for business development activities, sales & assigned tasks and inculcate an execution oriented culture into your team.  10. Have a keen eye for detail in every aspect of work / task assigned by the company. Travel:  Extensive travel is required for dealer visits/meet, product demonstrations for this position.  Qualification:  BBA or MBA in Sales/Marketing (with rural focus), or BE/BTech in Mechanical/Automotive Engineering Experience:  minimum 8 years of experience is required. Those who are meeting the our requirement criteria and can join asap, Please share CVs to jagannaath@kamms.net or whatsapp to 7092689999
column11: Sales, Sales Head, Agri Tools, Farm Equipment, Tractor, Tractor Sales, Marketing, harvester, Rotavator, Agriculture, Intercultivator, Inter cultivator, Agrictools, Dealer Development

column1: Sales Managers _ Farm Equipment-  Rotavator , Inter Cultivator For MH
column2: Sales Managers _ Agri Tools/ Farm Equipment Company for Karnataka, Tamilnadu    Should have experience in Rotavator, rotavator blades or intercultivator sales.   Comfortable to travel 18 days in a month for tours   If you are from Agri Tools/ Farm Equipment Company For , Please call us @ 7092689999 Or email your CV to jagannaath@kamms.net   Position Name: Sales Managers Position Type: Full time Job Location: Maharashtra - Pune/ Kolhapur, Aurangabad, Mumbai Suburbs (Base location can be anywhere in the respective states and we are hiring 2 candidates for each state)   We are on a mission to bring Farm Mechanization to every farm and to every farmer. We are Indias first Farm Mechanization B2B Marketplace, Knowledge-building platform and Supply Chain Solutions.   We cover all Agri Tools & Spares supporting the Entire Farming Cycle (Seedbed preparation, Sowing & plantation, Plant Cultivation, Harvesting and Threshing) We have the largest assortment of spare parts across the industry at one place. We provide spares of all machines and across all categories.  We hosts the most extensive and robust network of vendors across the agriculture sector in India. We partner with verified OEM and OES to provide quality spares at the fastest turnaround time  Position Roles and Responsibilities   We are looking for high-performing Sales Executives with experience in rural sales and marketing. You will be responsible for maximizing our sales team potential, travel to different places for dealer development, product demonstrations, customer support etc. The candidate must be familiar with agriculture machineries and rural market and should be comfortable to travel.  Responsibilities include:  1. Develop and execute on a sales plan for the assigned territory  2. Ability to build a team, train them and manage their performance in line with the planned targets   3. Identify new dealers & visiting dealers regularly to build a strong relationship and grow revenues  4. Demonstrate knowledge of after sales product issues and spare parts for various agricultural equipment   5. Develop business intelligence on various types of Agri equipment and technology selling in the market; on new products being launched and on prospects.  6. Understand crop seasons and farmer requirements in the respective territory.   7. Promote, handhold & convert dealers to digital approaches of doing business   8. Regular reporting on activities & developments in your territory to the assigned manager   9. Adhering to timelines and commitment for business development activities, sales & assigned tasks and inculcate an execution oriented culture into your team.  10. Have a keen eye for detail in every aspect of work / task assigned by the company. Travel:  Extensive travel is required for dealer visits/meet, product demonstrations for this position.  Qualification:  BBA or MBA in Sales/Marketing (with rural focus), or BE/BTech in Mechanical/Automotive Engineering Experience:  minimum 8 years of experience is required. Those who are meeting the our requirement criteria and can join asap, Please share CVs to jagannaath@kamms.net or whatsapp to 7092689999

column2: Job description  The job of an Admission Officer typically involves managing the admissions process for educational institutions, such as schools, colleges, or universities. Their primary responsibility is to ensure a smooth and efficient admissions process while adhering to the institution's policies and standards. Here is a general overview of the job description for an Admission Officer:   Application Processing:   Receive and review applications from prospective students.   Verify that all required documents and information are submitted.   Ensure applications meet the institution's admission criteria.   Communication:   Communicate with prospective students and their families to provide information about admission requirements, procedures, and deadlines.   Address inquiries and concerns related to the admission process.   Maintain effective communication channels with other departments and staff involved in the admissions process.   Interviews and Evaluations:   Conduct interviews with prospective students to assess their suitability for the institution.   Evaluate applicants based on academic achievements, standardized test scores, letters of recommendation, and other relevant criteria.   Decision Making:   Collaborate with the admissions committee to make informed decisions regarding acceptance, rejection, or placement of applicants.   Apply institutional policies and guidelines in the decision-making process.   Record Keeping:   Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of all applicants.   Ensure the confidentiality and security of sensitive applicant information.   Events and Outreach:   Represent the institution at recruitment events, fairs, and information sessions.   Organize and participate in campus tours and open houses to attract potential students.   Policy Compliance:   Stay informed about changes in admission policies, regulations, and standards.   Ensure compliance with relevant laws and regulations governing the admissions process.   Collaboration:   Collaborate with academic departments, financial aid offices, and other relevant stakeholders to facilitate a smooth transition for admitted students.   Problem Resolution:   Address and resolve any issues or disputes related to the admission process.   Work towards enhancing the overall applicant experience.   Data Analysis:   Analyze admissions data to identify trends, demographics, and areas for improvement.   Provide reports and recommendations to improve the admissions process   Job Types: Full-time, Permanent   Salary: 18000 - 45,000   Benefits:     Health insurance     Schedule:     Day shift     Experience:     total work: 1 year (Preferred)     Work Location: In person    Roles and Responsibilities   Job description  The job of an Admission Officer typically involves managing the admissions process for educational institutions, such as schools, colleges, or universities. column2: Career - Job description  AZURREO is a service provider specialized in the Telecommunications industry.   Our experts leverage more than 15 years of experience and methodologies,  and best practices to help our customers successfully tackle their challenges.   We work across disciplines at any point in the project lifecycle,  from strategy to design to implementation to operations and maintenance.     As part of our development,  we are currently seeking: Professional Services Engineer - Core Network.     Responsibilities include,  but not limited to:    Provide expertise and input for customization specification,  implementation and deployment,    Assessing customer needs,    Designing/ planning solutions and working with technical services and solutions partners in building and piloting solutions,    Support,  create and execute customer acceptance test plans (ATPs)   Develop and execute method of procedures (MOPs)   Participate in the development of tools and processes that improve team efficiencies and streamline day-to-day activities,    Coordinate the implementation of solutions and focus primarily on customer implementations and migrations,    Ensure technical assistance to the Customer until signature of final acceptance.  Can be involved by Customer training.    Manage the customer relationship and expectations,  communicate effectively,  troubleshoot and resolve technical issues with customer and teams,    Documentation and release administration of the deployment,    Participate in customer and project communications focusing on technical matters,    Effectively manage time and maintain regular communication and updates to both customer and management.     Masters or Bachelor's degree in Computer Science,  Electrical Engineer or equivalent experience,    CCNA, CCNP or equivalent IP networking certification will be appreciate.   Technical skills  The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge,  skill,  and/ or ability required:    Knowledge experience of data communications concepts of network architecture,  TCP/ IP Protocol suite,  SNMP,  NTP,  and troubleshooting,    Knowledge experience with the following LAN technologies: Ethernet (10/ 100/ 1000/ 10G),  VLANs,  Spanning-Tree,  and switching knowledge,    Knowledge experience with VPN,  IPSec,  Routing Protocols/ technologies,    Knowledge experience with network management,  OSS systems,  Cellular Cable technologies (PCMM,  DOCSIS),  Voice/ Video/ Data integration,    Knowledge experience with hardware platforms and Operating Systems: Linux/ Unix,  Windows XP,  HP Rack-mount server Server Blade platform,    Strong Knowledge/ experience 3G 4G Technologies: Diameter (RFC 3588) protocol/ applications/ interfaces,  LTE/ EPC/ IMS architectures (PCRF,  PCEF,  MME,  BBERF,  CSCF,  DRA,  OCS,  OFCS),    Working knowledge of SS7 Signaling,  SIGTRAN,  GSM and UMTS protocols,    Knowledge experience with SCTP,  TLS,  IPv4,  IPv6,    Knowledge Experience of subscriber database technologies: HLR,  HSS,  SPR,  EIR,  ENUM,  AAA,  SDS,  MySQL,  DB query/ scripting.   Position Requirements   Fluent English (Clearly communicate in English verbally or in writing),    Rigorous and organized,  with excellent capabilities of communication,    Good relational contact,    Goal-focused and responsible for "getting the job done".    Valid work permit required

column2: We Bizight Solutions Pvt. Ltd. are a Technology Marketing Agency and our greatest asset is our people.We have immediate opening in our company for a Business Development Manager .Bizight has also developed a software as service product called SalesPanda (www.salespanda.com) Industry: Information Technology and ServicesIndustry:Information Technology and Services Employment type: Full-timeEmployment type:Full-time Job Description : This is an exciting opportunity to join a fast-moving, fast-growing technology business, selling a forward-thinking and revolutionary SaaS product (Salespanda) globally to companies across all sectors. The role is to generate demand and close business for SalesPanda SaaS product and related digital marketing services.The job has realistic KPI-s and targets related to generating business for our organization. The ideal candidate should have demonstrated or potential skills for: Winning business through either technology or services sales selling to small and medium businesses (50-5000 people organizations) Consultative selling experience of SaaS Product and Digital Marketing services Excellent communication skills - both verbal and written Excellent presentation and demonstration skill Achieving/exceeding sales targets Understanding the need of delivering an exceptional customer experience consistently Tenacity and drive to succeed in a Sales role Personality and attitude to succeed in a competitive and meritocratic environment. On a typical day, the person in this role is expected to generate pipeline, nurture existing pipeline, demonstrate the product, prepare and make presentations and close deals. Of course with some help..Product : SalesPanda is an inbound marketing software for organizations to help them create demand on their website. Its an integrated tool to help you run inbound marketing right from creating marketing collaterals, improving SEO, promoting on social media to creating a sales funnel via landing pages and call to actions (CTAs). It also helps engage and convert traffic from our client sites using customized engagement windows. SalesPanda is meant for small to midsize companies who have small/limited marketing resources.Product :SalesPanda is an inbound marketing software for organizations to help them create demand on their website. column2: PrincipalBusiness Development Client Relations | Vimarsh Development Solutions Vimarsh Development Solutions is a pioneer in the field of social sector research and policy development in India. Set up in 1987 in response to Government of Indias need for evidence based policy and systems development,  Vimarsh has successfully completed more than 250 prestigious assignments covering the entire country including -National Status Report of Indian Systems of Medicine,  pilot of the US$ 329 million Child Survival and Safe Motherhood Programme,  National Family Health Survey-1,  Technical Assistance to 240 million European Commission supported Health and Family Welfare Sector Investment Programme,  National Evaluation of ICDS-1,  Tripura Participatory Natural Resource Management Project funded by KfWunder Indo-German Development Cooperation, Concurrent Evaluation of NRHM,  supporting German Government funded Value Addition In Horticulture,  Medicinal Aromatic Plants in Uttarakhand,  District Level Household Surveys-4in Maharashtra Madhya Pradesh.  Client relationships development and management for success in fresh/ continuing business acquisition and coordination of deliverables to them is challenging, especially in path breaking sector development work in multiple social sectors.It is one of the most critical and concurrent functions in Vimarsh. We are in search of a highly experienced client servicing professional as Principal to lead Business Client Relations function,  adding value to our ever-growing portfolio of clients in multiple sectors within and outside the country.   2.Summary of Position:   Thisis acritical senior management position charged with client identification,  relationship management,  business acquisition and coordination of project deliverables.   3. Detailed Responsibilities/  Tasks:   Lead the critical functions ofclient identification,  relationship management,  business acquisition and coordination of deliverables. The tasks include providing lead to:   Concurrent search,  identification and selection of new clients and opportunities,  within and outside the country,  in multiple sectors that Vimarsh works in,  to continuously expand its client base;  Acquisition and analysis of information and plans of existing/ new clients,  programmes/ projects;  Client engagement and expectations management;  Lead acquisition of business from existing and new clients;  Coordination expansion of business client product delivery network within outside the country;  Interface between clients project teams to exceed client expectations of deliverables.  4. Desired Profile of the Candidate:   Proven track record of business development in the social sector,  client servicing/ relationship managementin social sectors,  with national and international clients;  Excellent liaisoning and networking skills  Entrepreneurial spirit,  independent working style with little supervision needed;  Strong management capabilities,  including management of multiple teams,  multi-tasking and working to tight deadlines,  achieving financial targets;  Excellent communication skills andgood writing skills;  Enthusiasm,  a strong drive to succeedand commitment to exceptionally high quality results;  Ability to coordinatebusiness and product deliveryteams located in various states and countries  Very good knowledge and experience of working in MS Word,  MS PPT,  MS-Excel,  MS Outlooketc.   5. Desired Work Experience:   Minimum 5 years of experience of business development client servicing in social sectors with at least 2 years in a mid-level management position.  Full time permanent position,  competitive compensation package commensurate with salary history,  qualifications and relevant experience.  Vimarsh Development Solutions HQ,  Gurgaon.   Cover letter explaining your motivation for applying  A list of social sector projects acquired along with client names,  project details and duration  Current CTC and Indicative Expectatio

column2: Greetings from Culminant Outlook!  We have an immediate job opening with one of our Leading Paint Industry client in Tamil Nadu.  Position: Customer Associate (Field Sales) Qualification: Any Graduate  Location: Tamil Nadu (Open) Roll: Third Party Payroll (First 18 Months) Responsibilities:- ECA will be allocated at the local dealer counter. The ECA is to approach the consumers who walk-in to the store and inquire about their painting requirements. The consumers who already have a contractor for executing the painting job need to be pitched only the Color Consultancy/Color Visualization/ Royale Play Design/ Stencil/ Signature/ Ext. Wall Art on the Ezycolour Kiosk / Booklet and taken through it. The consumers who dont have a?contractor for executing the painting job need to be pitched the Paint Right Service apart (from Color Consultancy/Color Visualization on the Ezycolour Kiosk). As part of the Paint Right Service, the ECA needs to visit the consumer at his house at the appointment date & time. On the first visit, the ECA is to do?Site Evaluation and Site Measurement using the Paint Right Evaluation Kit, fill the Site Evaluation & Site Measurement formats and hand them over to the consumer. Post the same, the ECA is to provide Product Consultancy based on the Site Evaluation. Up selling (Special Effects, Luxury Emulsions) and Cross Selling (Smart Care, Wood finishes) would be the priority in Product Consultancy.? After product consultancy, the ECA shows the profiles of Ezycolour Trained Contractors along with their contact numbers OR pitches the Complete Painting Service as per the Dealer Capability. In case the consumer wants to go for Complete Painting Service, the ECA can show the Rate Card, the Terms & Conditions of the Service and ask the consumer to speak with the dealer for taking it forward. ECA has to do the recce, track and maintain potential upcoming painting sites and consumer details nearby his local shop The ECA will visit the consumer house?for Site Supervision at least once or more (as agreed upon with the dealer) while the site is in Work-In-Progress stage. There might be a final Site Closure visit after the completion of work (as agreed upon with the dealer). The ECA will have to fill the Daily???ork Report for every day of the week and share the same with the Team Leader every Saturday without fail. Kindly share the profiles as per the below criteria. Preferred Any bachelor degree? Age should be less than 25 yrs. Throughout education (10th, 12th, UG & PG)?candidate marks?should be 50 % and above Candidate shouldn?? have?any?backlogs?now. Backlogs if any, should have already been cleared within course duration Should not have any year gap in their education till now We want only male candidates. Interested candidates share your profile to  rahamath@culminatoutlook.com   Contact: 7824853015/9962138333

Key Responsibilities Identify sales opportunities for corporate salary accounts by building new relationships with corporates Manage business relations with existing corporate customers to increase the depth of existing relationships Achieve sales targets as assigned by the organization on a monthly basis Conduct market enhancement activities within the corporates to enhance the business Record and track all engagement activities through the CRM system Comply with KYC/SEBI rules, regulations, and legislation governing the financial services industry Qualifications: Optimal qualification for success on the job is: Graduation from a recognized institute Role Proficiencies: For successful execution of the job, the candidate should possess the following: Good communication (both verbal and written) skill in both English and the local language Excellent lead generation and conversion skill Ability to handle pressure and meet deadlines Ability to work successfully as a part of a team High sales orientation to meet the sales targets consistently

column2: About Neilsoft   At Neilsoft, our focus is to enhance our already impressive portfolio of Design to manufacture and design to construction  engineering software solutions. As a proud reseller of various renowned world class products, we can address our clients engineering software need efficiently and give them maximum return on investment. At Neilsoft, we know that the key to growth is a high-performing sales team. That?? why we??e seeking a qualified sales development representative (SDR) to find and screen potential customers who could benefit from our products and services. As the first line of communication with a prospect, the ideal SDR has a strong understanding of the sales process and excels at researching leads, starting new relationships, and setting up sales closers for success. The SDR should be a quick learner who has strong communication skills and an ability to showcase our offerings in a compelling way. Every potential customer is an opportunity for boosting top-line revenue growth, customer acquisition levels, and profitability. Job Location   : Chennai/Pune/Mumbai Position   : Sales Executive/Senior Sales Executive  Experience   : 0 to 4 Years Qualification   : BE civil / Bachelor of architecture / construction management etc, MBA preferred Objectives of this role Represent the company?? Engineering products and services, using comprehensive knowledge as well as customer research to explain how our solutions meet customer needs. Generate leads and build relationships by nurturing warm prospects and finding potential new sales opportunities. Manage and maintain a pipeline of interested prospects and engage sales executives in next steps. Identify best practices for refining the company?? lead-generation playbook. Responsibilities Utilize Salesforce, cold calls, and email to generate new sales opportunities and bring revenues. Maintain and grow business in your assigned territory, achieve or exceed 100% annual quota. Identify, qualify, and generate sales leads. Identify the needs of prospects and suggest appropriate products or services. Build long-term, trusting relationships with prospects to qualify leads as sales opportunities. Proactively seek new business opportunities in the market Set up meetings or calls between (prospective) customers and sales executives. Report monthly and weekly on sales progress and KPIs Preferred skills and qualifications Bachelor?? degree (or equivalent) or at least 0 to 4 years of relevant work experience. Experience as a sales development representative, with a track record of achieving sales quotas. Experience conducting business within a software sales environment, with any exposure to the AEC software market highly desirable, but we will consider software sales experience from other industries. Excellent verbal, written, and communication skills. Outstanding interpersonal, organization, and follow-up skills. Proficiency with Salesforce or other CRM software. Strong desire and ability to move up within a sales organization. Analytical yet creative thinker with superior problem-solving skills. Decisive and committed to growth. Characteristics like grit, strong work ethic, coachable, confidence, curiosity, self-awareness, and a focus on self-development will also be recognized and rewarded.

column2: Greetings from Hitech Specialities Solutions Ltd. We are a strategic trader and distributor of speciality chemicals across India. Keen insights and expertise have earned HSSL exclusive distribution rights for a number of leading global manufacturers. We are seeking motivated and enthusiastic Sales Executives to join our team.  We are hiring MBA/BBA or BSC freshers with confidence and positive approach. Job location: Mumbai, Delhi and Bangalore Responsibilities: Business management of distributors/dealers/OEMs in assigned area. Visiting OEMs regularly and relationship building. Responsible for planning and execution of business development activities for the complete range of products in the designated area. Ensuring follow ups in terms of samples, trials and any technical/commercial support as and when required by end users/dealers. Ensuring any issue raised by customers is resolved by collaborating with the line managers. Functional responsibility of achieving sales and collection target. Stay informed about industry trends, market conditions and competitor activities to identify opportunities of business growth. Provide regular reports on sales activities, achievements and challenges to the management team. Requirements: Education: Bachelor's degree in Science or Business Administration, Marketing, or related field. Experience: No prior experience required; fresh graduates are encouraged to apply. Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to articulate ideas clearly and persuasively. Negotiation Skills: Strong negotiation and persuasion skills to close sales deals and overcome objections. Self-Motivation: Highly self-motivated with a positive attitude and a willingness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment. Team Player: Ability to work collaboratively with colleagues and contribute to team goals. Tech-Savvy: Proficiency in MS Office applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and familiarity with CRM software is desirable. Networking Skills: Strong networking and relationship-building skills to expand client base and generate referrals. Interested applicants can share resumes to arti.patel@hitechgroup.com

column2: We are currently looking for a highly motivated and experienced Sales Executive to join our dynamic team. As a Sales Executive, you will play a pivotal role in selling our top-quality skincare products to micro resellers, distributors, and B2B prospects. If you have a passion for skincare and a proven track record in B2B sales, then this is the perfect opportunity for you to showcase your skills and contribute to the growth of our company. Responsibilities: - Identify potential clients and develop a strong understanding of their needs and requirements. - Generate leads and build a robust pipeline of prospects through various channels. - Conduct thorough research on potential clients to gather valuable insights and tailor your sales approach accordingly. - Utilize your exceptional communication and negotiation skills to effectively pitch our skincare products and close deals in a timely manner. - Collaborate closely with our marketing team to develop and execute targeted strategies that will help expand our market presence. - Provide excellent customer service and ensure that clients are satisfied with our products and services. - Stay up-to-date with industry trends and competitor activities to identify new opportunities for growth. Requirements: - A minimum of 3 years of relevant experience in skincare and B2B sales. - In-depth knowledge of skincare products, ingredients, and their benefits. - Proven track record in meeting and exceeding sales targets. - Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills to build strong relationships with clients. - Strong negotiation skills to secure profitable deals. - Highly self-motivated and results-driven, with the ability to work independently and as part of a team. - Exceptional time management and organizational skills to effectively prioritize tasks and meet deadlines. - Proficient in using CRM software and other sales tools to track leads and manage customer relationships. At our company, we value passion, innovation, and teamwork. Join our team and be a part of our exciting journey as we continue to revolutionize the skincare industry. We offer competitive compensation, a supportive work environment, and ample opportunities for career growth and development. If you are ready to make a significant impact and contribute to the success of our company, apply now and let's embark on this exciting journey together!

column2: Job Title: Sales Executive / Senior Sales Executive - Channel and Project Sales   Location: South India (flexible) and others   Our client is distinguished entity in the wood-based products for building and furnishing industry , boasting a legacy of over three decades in India.  We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales Executive/Senior Sales Executive to join our team, focusing on channel and project sales across South India. The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in expanding our market presence, driving revenue growth, and fostering long-term relationships with key stakeholders. Role & responsibilities     Key Responsibilities: Develop and execute strategic sales plans to achieve sales targets and objectives within the assigned territory. Identify and cultivate new channel partners, distributors, dealers, and project opportunities to maximize market penetration and revenue generation. Collaborate with architects, interior designers, contractors, and developers to promote our products and secure project specifications. Conduct market research and analysis to identify emerging trends, customer needs, and competitive threats, providing insights to enhance our sales strategies. Provide timely and accurate sales forecasts, reports, and insights to management, contributing to informed decision-making and resource allocation. Nurture existing client relationships, addressing their needs, resolving issues, and ensuring exceptional customer satisfaction. Represent the company at industry events, trade shows, and networking forums to enhance brand visibility and establish our presence in the market. Preferred candidate profile     Qualifications: Any Graduation Proven track record of success in channel sales, project sales, or related roles within the construction or building materials industry , preferably non-cement. Experience with OEM is key Strong business acumen with the ability to analyze market trends, identify opportunities, and develop strategic sales plans. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and influence stakeholders at all levels. Willingness to travel extensively within the assigned territory. Perks and benefits   Attractive package and benefits

column2: What will you be doing      This role is to be the first point of contact for a number of developing accounts and new business enquiries within the team. It is challenging, yet extremely rewarding, as it involves high levels of client interaction, relationship management (both onsite and offsite) as well as designing and delivering impactful service packages for the Diagnostic Centers across the country.       Lead major radiology job identification, responsible for the development and delivery of high profile account leads, insights and recommendations         Create and maintain strong relationships with all main client decision makers/budget holders, developing the application of consumer panel as a solution to answer business questions to ensure a strong influence on client thinking         Work with our Sales partners/channel to collaboratively provide quotations and proposals for new business requests and ad hoc work         Maintain a dialogue with key client stakeholders about their ongoing hot topics, regional/country priorities, proactively identifying opportunities         Develop opportunities to grow revenue for the team, with a focus on widening our network and increasing the contribution of TH services.         Coach, train and manage more junior members of the team, sharing knowledge and encouraging a culture of learning.         Support junior members on smaller accounts, delivery of presentation and client meetings.         What skills and experiences would the ideal candidate have        Experience delivering against commercial targets and act proactively in pursuit of opportunities.         Knowledge and experience of quantitative research across a range of projects         Be dedicated, taking ownership of tasks, working independently, creatively and resourcefully         A team player with experience working with multiple stakeholders and partners.         A desire to develop commercial skills through spotting opportunities proactive project-mining, and proposal writing. column2: Roles and Responsibilities Qualification : MBA or PG / Graduate (Any)  Experience:  4 to 9 years Role:  City Sales Executive is expected to have immense proactive approach and exemplary levels of ownership. The station head will play the pivotal role for driving all sales and ops team of the area/ city towards the goals and mentor all stake holders and teams to achieve the KRAs and KPIs of the process. He will also be responsible for coordinating and implementing of new initiatives aimed towards continuous improvement of processes and exhibit strong leadership skills in handling cross functional teams.  Responsibilities:   Responsible for driving & achieving the performance metrics of warehouse operations and sales. Daily & weekly resource planning (Manpower, vehicles etc) based on planned loads Develop and mentor sales teams to achieve and exceed targets. Collaborate with operations, procurement and other stake holders to enhance customer base coverage and market presence in the city Soft skills Training & on-job retraining of staff & resources Responsible for achieving the cost parameter metrics for both warehousing, logistics and sales force Develop and maintain key sales initiatives and programs, techniques to support the sale team in market coverage Daily analysis of sales targets and operational metrics and creating actionable aimed towards continuous improvement Plan & implement alternate course of actions in case of exigencies. Enforce discipline in all aspects of nodal / station/ warehouse and sales operations Responsible for Identifying Channel Partners for warehouse setup in the assigned geography as per the company guidelines. Responsible for managing the warehouse operations viz. Inventory performance in the warehouse Controlling damage. Stock reconciliation at warehouse Delivery performance to outlets. Responsible for smooth running of Partner Operations in the assigned geography.   Skills Required:   Strong communication skill Minimum 2 years of FMCG Sales or Telecom (Prepaid Sales) experience Must have handled Channel Partner/Distributors in previous stint. Skilled in handling logistics operations and sales operations Good relationship management skills and ability to lead small to medium cross functional teams Ability to understand dynamics of supply chain and aptitude to learn software requirements related to the industry Intermediate IT skills (MS-Office. Specially Excel), Experience on working on ERPs and database management Territory Knowledge is a must

column2: A.   Key Responsibility Areas (KRAs): The Franchise Dealer Associate will be mapped to a dealer, and hence his main job is  secondary sales, lead conversion & contractor activation . 1.   Business outcome:  Sales value and special products turnover through franchise dealer counter.  2.   Lead Conversion:  Would focus on lead conversion for painting services for the central, dealer and self leads. 3.   Enrolment:  To enroll the painters and contractors in the Sparkle Loyalty Program. 4.   Activation:  The painters and contractors need to be contacted on a regular basis so that they are kept active in the system.  5.   Display:  Responsible for maintaining the planogram & display at the shop for franchise counters.  6.   Meets:  Painter/contractor shop meetings along with TSM/TSE.  B. column2: Executive Client   Acquisition Location:   Chennai Department:   NSD   (New   Sales   Division) About   Us: IndiaMART   is   India's   largest   online   B2B   marketplace , connecting buyers with sellers. Over last 25 years, we have been continuously evolving our platform using sophisticated business-enablement technologies  to   make   doing business   easy . Our credo,  'Bada   Aasaan   Hai, ' appropriately depicts our approach. With 76 million product offerings and  6.7   million   responsive supplier  base, we provides ease and convenience to our  138   million   buyers . Our IPO was a thumping success in 2019, reaffirming the trust of our users and investors alike. Headquartered in Noida, we have 3,000+ employees located across 32 offices in the country. Why   Join   IndiaMART   : Our greatest assets are the IndiaMARTians. For our employees personal andprofessional development, we provide a variety of career advancement opportunities as well as learning and development activities. They get the benefit of working with India's largest online B2B marketplace along with a  fast-paced   career   progression . Potential employees can advance to the leadership roles within five years of their work tenure. We have more than 500 employees working with us who are testimony to this program. The superheroes take advantage of our cutting-edge  I-LEAP   program , which allows employees to  "Learn   as   they   Work   .  Our Superlative Incentive Programs, arguably among the best in business today, allows them to earn more as they do more. Key   Success   factors   for   an   Individual: ??Passion and drive to excel ??Hunger to learn and grow ??Customer Orientation What   the   Role   offers: This position allows you to build new clients for the organization, build rapportand trust  in both yourself and the company. Our top sales professionals are passionate and  driven in order to produce top results, all the while maintaining integrity. Our sales professionals focus on face-to-face sales presentations as they provide our clients an opportunity to know IndiaMART & value addition IndiaMART can bring to their respective business. Position holder will be anindividual contributor, responsible to drive sales activities within assigned region. Key   Responsibilities: ??To generate leads from given database & Identify decision makers within targeted leadsand initiate the sales process. ??To penetrate all targeted accounts and originate sales opportunities for the company's products and services. ??To set up and deliver sales presentations, product/service demonstrations on daily basis. ??To ensure systematic follow-up with the client organizations to take the sales pitch to time-bound closure. ??To ensure that all payments are collected as per the company's payment terms. Critical   Skills   of   a   Suitable   Candidates: ??Quick thinking and problem-solving skills ??Excellent verbal communication skills ??Excellent active listening skills ??Innovative vision and foresight to anticipate and create new opportunities that resonate with your customer. You   Can   Apply   if   you   possess: ??At least 12 months of relevant sales experience. ??MBA freshers can also apply ??Should have a laptop and bike (with valid RC and DL) ??MBA or any Equivalent Degree (at least 65% throughout)

column2: Role & responsibilities     Business Development: Identify and target potential clients in industries that require thermoforming and vacuum forming solutions. Research market trends, competitors, and industry developments to identify new business opportunities. Generate leads through cold-calling, networking, and attending industry events. Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients to understand their needs and ensure their satisfaction. Collaborate with clients to understand their specific requirements and provide appropriate product recommendations. Regularly communicate with clients to update them on product offerings, promotions, and company developments. Sales Presentations and Consultation: Conduct product presentations, demonstrating the benefits and features of our thermoforming and vacuum forming solutions. Provide consultative sales guidance by understanding client challenges and suggesting tailored solutions. Quoting and Pricing: Prepare accurate and competitive quotes based on client requirements and company pricing strategies. Negotiate pricing and terms while ensuring profitability for the company. Sales Target Achievement: Develop and implement sales strategies to meet or exceed sales targets. Monitor and report on sales performance, taking corrective actions as needed to achieve goals. Collaboration and Communication: Work closely with internal teams, including engineering and production, to ensure client needs are met effectively. Provide feedback to the management team on market trends, client feedback, and product improvement opportunities. Preferred candidate profile  : Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Engineering, or related field (preferred). Proven experience in B2B sales, preferably in the thermoforming or vacuum forming industry. Strong understanding of thermoforming and vacuum forming processes, materials, and applications. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to comprehend technical aspects of products and translate them into customer benefits. Self-motivated with a proactive approach to identifying and pursuing sales opportunities. Proficiency in using CRM software, MS Office, and sales tracking tools. Perks and benefits:   Competitive base salary and commission structure. Opportunities for professional growth and development. Health and retirement benefits. Travel opportunities to attend industry events and visit clients.

column2: A Sales/Business Development Executive is a results-driven professional responsible for identifying and acquiring new business opportunities, nurturing client relationships, and driving revenue growth     This role involves strategically prospecting potential clients, understanding their needs, and effectively presenting and selling the organization's products or services     Key Responsibilities:Lead Generation: Identify and research potential clients, industries, and markets to generate new sales leads and opportunities     Client Acquisition: Develop and execute sales strategies to acquire new clients and customers, including cold calling, networking, attending industry events, and leveraging digital channels     Client Relationship Management: Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with existing clients to ensure satisfaction, retention, and upselling opportunities     Sales Presentations: Create compelling sales presentations and proposals that effectively communicate the organization's products or services, highlighting their value and addressing client needs     Negotiation: Negotiate contract terms, pricing agreements, and service-level agreements with clients, striving for mutually beneficial partnerships     Sales Targets: Set and achieve sales targets and revenue goals, consistently meeting or exceeding quotas     Market Analysis: Stay informed about market trends, competitor activities, and industry developments to identify growth opportunities and refine sales strategies     Product/Service Knowledge: Develop a deep understanding of the organization's products or services and effectively convey their value pros to clients     Sales Reporting: Maintain accurate records of sales activities, track progress, and regularly report on sales performance and forecasts     Feedback Loop: Gather and relay client feedback, market insights, and competitor intelligence to the organization for product/service improvement and innovation     Customer Service: Address and resolve client inquiries, concerns, or issues promptly and professionally, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction     Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product development, and customer support, to achieve sales objectives and align strategies
column11: Sales, Business Development Executive, Sales Executive

column2: Job Title: Sales Executive Company:  Krishitek Industries Pvt. Ltd. Location:  Ahmedabad Job Type:  Full-time About Krishitek:  Krishitek is a leading provider of agricultural technology solutions, dedicated to revolutionizing the way farmers manage their crops and improve their yields. Our innovative products and services leverage cutting-edge technology to empower farmers and enhance agricultural productivity. At Krishitek, we are committed to driving positive change in the agricultural industry and making a meaningful impact on farmers' lives. Job Summary:  Krishitek is seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Sales Executive to join our dynamic sales team. The Sales Executive will be responsible for generating leads, prospecting new clients, and closing sales deals for Krishitek's range of agricultural technology solutions. The ideal candidate will have a passion for sales, excellent communication skills, and a strong understanding of the agricultural industry. Responsibilities: Prospect,      identify, and qualify new leads through cold calling, networking, and      other lead generation methods. Develop      and maintain a pipeline of potential clients and opportunities. Conduct      product presentations and demonstrations to potential clients, showcasing      the benefits and features of Krishitek's products and services. Understand      the needs and requirements of prospective clients and recommend suitable      solutions to address their challenges. Negotiate      pricing, terms, and contracts with clients to close sales deals. Collaborate      with the marketing team to develop sales materials, presentations, and      promotional campaigns. Provide      regular updates and reports on sales activities, progress, and forecasts. Stay      informed about industry trends, market developments, and competitor      activities. Build      and maintain strong relationships with clients to ensure customer      satisfaction and retention. Attend      industry events, trade shows, and conferences to represent Krishitek and      network with potential clients. Requirements: Bachelor's      degree in Business Administration, Agriculture, Marketing, or related      field. Proven      track record of success in sales, preferably in the agricultural industry. Strong      understanding of agricultural technology solutions and trends. Excellent      communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Ability      to build rapport and establish long-term relationships with clients. Self-motivated      and results-oriented with a drive to exceed sales targets. Ability      to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Proficiency      in Microsoft Office suite and CRM software. Willingness      to travel as required.

column2: Job description Position: Sales Engineer / Executive. Reports to: Coordinator / Management Industry: Industrial Capital Equipment (B2B) We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Sales Engineer / Executive to join our dynamic team.  Responsibilities: 1. Should be a go getter and generate leads and convert the leads into monetary benefits for the organization. 2. Understand, develop, and achieve the sales target in the given territory. 3. Study the market and provide the inputs to the superiors for preparing the business plans in enhancing the sales. 4. Prepare annual action plans to meet the sales and order bookings as per the given targets. 5. Establish a good rapport with the customers and ensure that no orders are lost to the competitors. 6. Identify the potential customers and establish business for the products under the scope. 7. Study the requirements of the customers thoroughly and provide suitable applications/solutions based on the product standards to create a long-term relationship. 8. Develop and implement strategic plans to promote revenue, profitability and market share and growth. 9. Identify and support the non-recurring, and unsatisfied customers, to create win-win possibilities. 10. Maintain all the required inputs and ensure an effective internal communication system. 11. Monitor and interpret the competitors activities and gather information on price, products, new development, delivery schedule, merchandising techniques, and develop the counter sales. 12. Develop a good rapport with the cross-functional teams and ensure that the sales as per the agreed terms and conditions. 13. Ensure the collection of payment, and statutory forms as per the terms and conditions of the sales of machines whenever applicable. 14. Work closely with the service department to ensure the best after sales support and achieve customer satisfaction and get the reference for sales. 15. Develop a good rapport with the product specialist to develop the market and enhance sales. 16. Must travel to client?? place and enhance business. Preferred candidate profile Hardworking & quick learner. Self Confidence & Positive Attitude. Sales skills. Female / male candidates only need to apply. Stability Most important. Educational Requirement: A bachelor?? degree in engineering / administration / marketing or any related discipline. Must Have:  2-3 years of proven experience in sales or a similar customer-facing role is a MUST.  Strong communication and presentation skills.  A go-getter who is self-motivated while still working in a collaborative team environment.  Excellent verbal and written communication skills to convey product information, negotiate with clients and build long-term relationships.  Proficiency in English and Hindi.  Ability to write professional and polished emails from time to time.  Proficiency in MS Office applications.  Time management skills to handle multiple tasks and meet deadlines.  Customer-centric mindset and dedication to delivering high-quality service. Join our team and be part of an exciting journey to drive sales growth and make a significant impact on our company's success. We are excited and look forward to meeting you soon! This position is based in Delhi (Ghitorni). Candidates residing in or willing to relocate to Delhi/ NCR are encouraged to apply. Note: The job description provided above is intended to outline the general nature and level of work being performed by individuals assigned to this position.

column2: What will you be doing? Lead Generation: Collaborate with the marketing team to identify and follow up on potential leads within the target sectors. Qualification Calls: Conduct thorough qualification calls to understand the business needs and goals of potential clients.
