Direct Meetings and Demonstrations: Schedule and organize face-to-face or virtual meetings with qualified leads. Conduct engaging product demonstrations, highlighting the benefits and features of iB Cricket Business Edition. Address any queries or concerns raised during the meetings and tailor the presentation to the specific needs of each prospect. Follow-ups: Maintain regular communication with prospects through follow-up calls, emails, and other communication channels. Provide additional information, materials, or resources as needed to facilitate the decision-making process. Sales Closure: Work towards closing sales deals by addressing objections, negotiating terms, and aligning the iB Cricket solution with the client's business objectives. Collaborate with the legal and finance teams to finalize contracts and ensure a smooth transition to the implementation phase. Client Relationship Management: Build and nurture long-term relationships with clients to encourage repeat business and referrals. Gather feedback on the product and relay insights to the product development team for continuous improvement. Flexibility: Be adaptable to take on redefined roles and responsibilities as needed to support the company's strategies and overall success. What are we looking for? Minimum experience of 2-3 years  in B2B sales or similar roles. Proven experience in B2B sales, preferably in the entertainment, real estate, Insurance and banking sectors. column2: Job Title: Sales Executive - Travel and Tourism Industry Job Description: As a Sales Executive in the travel and tourism industry, your primary responsibility is to generate revenue by selling accommodation, services, and products to businesses, individual and corporate clients. You will be representing the company and promoting its offerings to potential customers, while also maintaining and nurturing relationships with existing clients. Key Responsibilities: Sales Generation: Actively seek out new sales opportunities through networking, cold calling, and attending events. Develop and maintain a pipeline of leads and prospects. Present, promote, and sell accommodations, and other related services to clients. Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships. Address client inquiries and concerns promptly and professionally. Provide exceptional customer service throughout the sales process and during travel experiences. Gather feedback from clients to improve services and tailor offerings to their needs. Market Research and Analysis: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, market conditions, and competitors' activities. Analyze sales data and market insights to identify opportunities for growth and development. Collaborate with the marketing team to develop effective sales strategies and promotional campaigns. Administrative Tasks: Prepare and submit sales contracts, quotations, and proposals. Maintain accurate records of sales activities, client interactions, and payments. Collaborate with other departments, such as operations and finance, to ensure smooth execution of sales transactions. Targets and Reporting: Set and achieve sales targets and objectives within designated territories or market segments. Provide regular reports on sales performance, forecasts, and market trends to management. Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree  Proven experience in sales, preferably in the travel and tourism industry. Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Excellent organizational and time management abilities. Proficiency in MS Office, goggle sheets. Willingness to travel as required. Knowledge of foreign languages (depending on target markets) is a plus. This job description outlines the general responsibilities and qualifications expected of a Sales Executive in the travel and tourism industry. However, specific duties and requirements may vary depending on the company's size, location, and target market. Interested candidates can contact  Dia Rathore: 70622728888

Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Highly motivated and results-oriented. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent time management skills. Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunity to work in a fast-paced and dynamic industry. Be part of a growing and successful company. Why You Should Apply: If you are a passionate and motivated marketing professional with a strong understanding of the PEB industry, we encourage you to apply! Maintain relationships with clients by providing sales information, and guidance; researching and recommending new opportunities; recommending profit and service improvements. A self-starter and go-getter who can effectively work within a strong team culture. The Inside Sales Executive will be responsible for identifying, mapping, qualifying potential. An inside sales rep will play a fundamental role in achieving our ambitious customer acquisition and revenue growth objectives. Follow up with clear and effective approach, to convince the customer and help him to decide. Desired Candidate Profile Proven experience in selling B2B, SaaS, digital marketing solutions.  Minimum of 3-5 years of sales experience. A self starter and has a innovative approach to business development.  Experience in sales / business Development / Inside Sales.  Should be able to work as an individual contributor to generate expected revenue. Strong track record of achieving and exceeding sales targets. Excellent ability to assess customer needs and drive sales through effective solution selling. Proficient in CRM software and sales management tools. Experience in online demonstrating solutions is a plus.  Good organizational, communication, negotiation, and problem solving skills.   Takes ownership of tasks and drives it to completion. Ability to work under pressure and achieve sales objectives. Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. MBA preferred. This role is ideal for a strategic thinker with a strong background in  B2B sales- SaaS solutions, digital marketing solutions, B2B platforms, Edutech solutions, and concepts.  Note: Candidate who can appear for face to face interview on weekdays ( Monday to Friday) should apply. Job Benefits & Perks Performance based incentives.

column2: Position:   Inside Sales Associate Location:  Remote/Mumbai   Role Overview:  As an Inside Sales Associate, you'll play a pivotal role in driving sales with NGOs. Operating within a startup environment, you'll need unwavering enthusiasm, energy, and a hands-on approach to achieve your goals swiftly. This role demands a high degree of execution focus, transforming ideas from conception to implementation efficiently. An interest in talking to people, engaging with them and helping them find solutions will deliver success in this role. Roles & Responsibilities Provide a video DEMO of our platform to NGOs who reach out to us. You will NOT be engaged in cold-calling. You will only reach out to NGOs who enquire with us. Address client queries, provide solutions, and ensure client satisfaction in making a successful sale Follow up rigorously with NGOs to close sales Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure customer delight   Qualifications Strong communication both oral & written in English. Speaking fluency in multiple languages is an added advantage 0-2 years of experience in sales Ability to grasp things fast An ability to think both innovatively and creatively will help to provide solutions to clients   Additional Details Timings: 9.30 AM to 6.30 PM IST (Mon-Fri), 9:30 AM - 2 PM (2 working Saturdays)  Employment Type: Full Time, Permanent   Note: This role reports directly to your manager. While experience is important, we are more interested in what you have achieved in business development, sales, marketing, customer service, operations, and team management.

column2: JOB DESCRIPTION:       iConsultera is seeking a candidate who possess a high energy level, outgoing personality, and be results-oriented, with demonstrated success in promoting offshore/outsourcing. The Associate generates research on prospects and assembles reports to use in attracting and inciting prospects interest in partnering with iConsultera for Offshore Recruitment Support. Also, the Associate maintains the prospect database, cold calls and follows-up with agency-generated leads, maintains and follows up on regular new business mailings, looks for new leads, books eAppointments, creates prospect profiles, and stays up to date on correspondence relating to all prospect contacts.       RESPONSIBILITIES:         Build and maintain a sales pipeline.         Prospect through phone calls, emails, and social media.         Consult with prospects and business targets about our RPO services.         Present, promote, and sell RPO services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers.         Report regularly on the progress of opportunities to develop new business channels or networks.         Establish, develop, and maintain positive business and customer relationships.         Drafting email campaigns, client proposals, agreements and additional business documents/presentations required for sales/prospecting purpose.         QUALIFICATION:         6 months or more promoting/selling/marketing to international markets with outsourcing/offshoring being highly preferred.         Highly motivated individual with hands-on experience managing social marketing campaigns.         Excellent selling, communication, and negotiation skills         Good understanding of recruitment life cycle.         Familiarity using LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Contact Generation tools and email marketing tools such as Mail Chimp and Constant Contact.

column2: ?       You are a charismatic young creative hustler who loves to meet and engage with people. You understand that sales are all about building trust and rapport. You realize that business is more about helping a customer and solving their problem then only making a profit. You want to grow your career in the hyper growing cyber security industry.               You are a perfect fit for this if:        -You have 3-7 years of IT industry experience as a sales professional.         -You enjoy helping others.         -You are a team player who gels well in the team.         -You are always the friendliest one among the strangers.         -You are an amazing storyteller who can mesmerize people through your fascinating stories.         -Sales and negotiation skills are in your DNA.         -You are expectantly good with numbers.         -You are a creative thinker who can make people smile by using unorthodox ideas.         -You are extremely organized about anything you do.         -You are obsessed with learning and growing in the sales field.         -You read sales and self-help books and blogs.         -You have a role model whose path you want to follow.         -You are a technology enthusiast and stay updated about new technology innovations.         -You love to find out efficient solutions for laborious work.         -You have a proven track record of sales.         -You are comfortable with carrying sales targets and have consistently achieved your targets.         -You have the tenacity to develop ideas independently and thrive in a fast-paced start-up environment.         -You appreciate the rewards, satisfaction, and freedoms that a successful sales career can bring.               Your everyday work will look like:        -Learn about company product and service offerings.         -Develop a growth strategy focused both on financial gain and customer satisfaction.         -Develop a sales goal and ensure they are met.         -Conduct research to identify new markets and customer needs.         -Find out and build rapport with decision-makers and prospects.         -Build long-term relationships with new prospects and existing customers.         -Create contract-winning proposals for current and prospective clients.         -Attend weekly sales team meetings and provide information to management about sales figures, KPI, goals, and obstacles.         -Attend conference, meeting and industry events to build a network and to promote our offerings.         -Identifies trendsetter ideas by researching industry and related events, publications, and announcements.         -Update job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities, reading professional publications, maintaining personal     network.         -Responsible for the entire sales cycle starting from lead generation, submitting the proposal, negotiating with the client, and closing     the order.           ?

column2: About Us: POSHN is a new and exciting India-based ag-fintech venture founded in 2020 and supported by leading US based VCs, big venture debt and leading NBFCs. Were on a mission to organise and digitally transform global agri-supply chain market. We are applying first principles thinking and re-imagining the solutions with a tech-product first mindset. The agri-supply chain space is gigantic, complex and has been largely un-organised. So, we are taking the hassle out of it by creating a platform that empowers our products and facilitates a better, efficient and seamless experience between each stakeholder.   Team: Core team holds together alumni of BITS Pilani, IIM & XLRI with each having decade long experience in the fields of supply chain, technology and product. Previously, we have built several highly impactful tech-product start-ups from ground up. About the Role: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Area Sales Executive to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for promoting and selling our range of FMCG products to general trade retailers within the West Delhi area. Responsibilities Develop and maintain strong relationships with general trade retailers in the West Delhi area. Achieve sales targets through effective planning and budget management. Implement strategic sales plans to accommodate corporate goals. Present and sell company products to current and potential clients. Follow up on new leads and referrals resulting from field activities. Prepare status reports, including activity, closings, follow-up, and adherence to goals. Qualifications Minimum of 2 years' experience in sales, specifically within the FMCG sector. Proven track record of achieving sales targets. Strong understanding of West Delhi region (mandatory) Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Ability to persuade and influence others. About you: We want you to come with creativity, expertise, flexibility and drive, but above all a desire to learn and keep learning You enjoy taking responsibilities and ownership of tasks. Curious and a continuous hunger for learning and staying up to date with the latest solutions on the market Analytical mind Creativity, open-minded attitude   Benefits : We offer a competitive salary and sales based incentives Flexible hours and work arrangements Become one of the key team members of an exciting startup changing the agri-supply chain industry   How to Apply: To apply for this position, please email your resume and salary expectations to hr@poshn.co

column2: Job Summary: As an Inside Sales Executive you will be responsible for identifying and developing new  business opportunities through a mix of cold calling, database creation, market  research, lead qualification, data mining, LinkedIn messaging, and account-based  marketing. Your role will involve engaging with potential clients to understand their needs  and positioning our products and solutions to meet those needs effectively. Key Responsibilities:  1. Calling prospects to generate new sales leads. 2. Perform extensive market research to identify potential customers and understand industry trends. 3. Qualify leads based on their potential to purchase our offerings. 4. Utilize data mining techniques to gather actionable business intelligence. 5. Reach out to prospects through LinkedIn messaging and other social media platforms to establish contact and gather interest. 6. Execute account-based marketing strategies through personalized emails to engage targeted accounts. 7. Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to develop and refine sales strategies. 8. Maintain accurate records of all sales activities and prepare regular forecasts to track performance. Qualifications: 1. Proven 2-3 years of experience in a sale or inside sales role. 2. Strong ability to conduct cold calls and communicate effectively over the phone. 3. Excellent research skills and proficiency in using LinkedIn and other data mining tools. 4. column2: We are looking for B2B Counter sales executive who will ensure that business clients receive personalized attention and assistance during their visits and provides specialized sales support, enhance the customer experience, and driving growth in the B2B segment.   1. Customer Service:  Welcome business clients visiting our showroom in a friendly and professional manner, and assist them with their garment selection and purchasing decisions.   2. Product Knowledge:  Develop a comprehensive understanding of our garment products, including fabrics, designs, and sizing, to effectively advise clients and address their inquiries.  3. Order Processing:  Process orders from business clients, ensuring accuracy in product selection, pricing, and quantities, and coordinating with the warehouse team to fulfill orders on time.  4. Upselling and Cross-Selling:  Identify opportunities to upsell complementary garment products or accessories to meet the needs and preferences of business clients and increase sales revenue.   5. Fashion Trends Awareness:  Stay informed about current fashion trends, industry developments, and competitor offerings to provide clients with relevant recommendations and maintain a competitive edge.  6. Relationship Building:  Build and maintain strong relationships with business clients, understanding their specific requirements and preferences, and proactively following up to ensure customer satisfaction and repeat business.  7. Inventory Management:  Monitor garment inventory levels, replenish stock as needed, and collaborate with the procurement team to introduce new products or discontinue slow-moving items based on client feedback and market demand.  8. Sales Reporting:  Maintain accurate records of sales transactions, client interactions, and product performance, and provide regular reports to management on sales metrics, trends, and client feedback.  9. Team Collaboration:  Collaborate effectively with colleagues in sales, marketing, and customer service departments to coordinate sales efforts, share market insights, and address client needs and concerns.  10. Compliance:  Adhere to company policies and procedures, including pricing guidelines, discount policies, and data privacy regulations, to ensure ethical and compliant business practices.  Required Skills  Proven experience in B2B sales, preferably in the garment industry.  Strong understanding of sales principles and customer service practices.  Excellent communication and presentation skills.  Demonstrated ability to build and maintain client relationships.  Self-motivated, target-driven, and results-oriented.  Familiarity with CRM software and sales analytics

column2: **Job Description: Gold Loan Sales Executive with Cross-Selling** **Position Overview:** We are seeking a motivated and dynamic individual to join our team as a Gold Loan Sales Executive. In this role, you will be responsible for managing the loan application process, focusing on gold loans, and cross-selling other financial products. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication skills, a strong understanding of financial products, and a passion for delivering exceptional customer service. **Key Responsibilities:** 1. **Client Consultation:** Meet with clients to understand their financial needs and provide guidance on loan products, including gold loans and other cross-selling opportunities. 2. **Loan Application Processing:** Guide clients through the loan application process, ensuring all required documentation is collected and accurately processed. 3. **Risk Assessment:** Assess the creditworthiness of clients by analyzing financial documents, credit scores, and other relevant factors to determine loan eligibility. 4. **Product Knowledge:** Stay updated on various loan products offered by the institution and recommend the most suitable options based on clients' needs. 5. **Compliance:** Ensure compliance with regulatory guidelines and internal policies throughout the loan origination process. 6. **Communication:** Maintain regular communication with clients to provide updates on their loan applications and address any questions or concerns. 7. **Collaboration:** Coordinate with internal teams such as underwriting, legal, and customer service to expedite the loan approval process. 8. **Customer Relationship Management:** Build and maintain strong relationships with clients to encourage repeat business and referrals. 9. **Documentation:** Prepare and review loan documents to ensure accuracy and completeness before submission for approval. 10. **Performance Tracking:** Monitor key performance metrics related to loan origination, approval rates, and customer satisfaction, and implement strategies for improvement as needed. **Role Details:** - **Role:** Gold Loan Sales Executive with Cross-Selling - **Industry Type:** Financial Services - **Department:** Sales & Business Development - **Employment Type:** Full Time, Permanent - **Role Category:** Retail & B2C Sales **Education and Key Skills:** - **Education:** Any Graduate (UG) / Any Postgraduate (PG) - **Key Skills:** Gold Loan Executive, Retail Banking Sales, Cross-Selling, Financial Services, Customer Relationship Management We are looking for individuals who are passionate about providing financial solutions and delivering exceptional service to our clients. If you possess the required skills and qualifications, we encourage you to apply and embark on a rewarding career journey with us.

column2: Job Title:  Sales Executive (Female) Company:  Wemakeup India Location:  Udyog Vihar, Gurugram About Us: Wemakeup India is a premier makeup service-providing company dedicated to empowering individuals with confidence and enhancing their natural beauty. We offer a range of professional makeup services tailored to our client's unique needs, ensuring they look and feel their best for any occasion. Job Description: We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Sales Executive to join our team at Wemakeup India. The ideal candidate will be a female with a soft-spoken voice, fluent in both English and Hindi, and possess at least 1 year of sales experience. As a Sales Executive, you will play a pivotal role in driving sales and revenue growth for our company. Responsibilities:   Working on leads and calls provided through our online platform.  Identify and cultivate new business opportunities through networking, cold calling, and other lead-generation activities.   Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients to promote repeat business and customer loyalty.   Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase our makeup services and offerings.   Provide exceptional customer service by addressing client inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring client satisfaction.   Stay up-to-date on industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments to identify opportunities for growth.   Collaborate with the marketing team to develop promotional campaigns and marketing materials to support sales initiatives.   Prepare and submit sales reports, forecasts, and other documentation as required by management. Requirements:   Female candidate with a soft-spoken voice and excellent communication skills in English and Hindi.   Minimum of 1 year of experience in sales, preferably in the beauty or service industry.   Proven track record of achieving sales targets and driving revenue growth.   Strong negotiation and persuasion skills with the ability to close deals effectively.   Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.   Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport with clients and colleagues.   Proficient in MS Office and CRM software.   Flexible schedule with the ability to work evenings and weekends as needed. Join our passionate team at Wemakeup India and be part of a company that is dedicated to helping individuals look and feel their best. If you have a passion for sales and beauty, we want to hear from you! Apply now and embark on an exciting career journey with us. Salary Note: Fixed salary - Upto 25,000 - 30,000 Incentives - Upto 30,000 Benefits: - Competitive salary. - Performance-based incentives. - Training and development opportunities. - Friendly and collaborative work environment.

Client Relationship Management: Building and maintaining strong client relationships to understand their needs, provide tailored solutions, and ensure client satisfaction.     Sales Presentations: Preparing and delivering persuasive sales presentations to potential clients, often involving complex or high-value deals.     Proposal and Quotation Creation: Creating and presenting proposals, quotes, and bids to potential clients, including negotiations on terms and agreements.     Market Research: Conducting in-depth market research to identify trends, competition, and opportunities for growth.     Team Leadership: Often, senior BDEs are responsible for leading and guiding a team of business development professionals.     Product/Service Knowledge: In-depth knowledge of the company's products or services, allowing for effective communication of their value to clients.

column2: The Business Development Executive role is extremely important and pivotal to the growth of the company. This position is responsible for lead generation as well as the sales conversion and repeat business for all customers and clients. Preparation for weekly meeting with the management      To attend marketing sales meetings to brainstorm on new or existing sales strategies.      Monthly:      Close 2 3 new clients from your pipeline      Close 1 new sales partner from your pipeline      Preparing for monthly meeting with Management Team      Use our referral program to receive 2 qualified referrals per month      Attend a webinar or training event to gain/sharpen skills      2. To be proactive in adding value to prospects to ensure current brand positioning as a Dependable IT Partner      Schedule face to face meetings/conference calls with potential new clients      Ensure outbound telemarketing as per script      Understanding pain points of the prospects mapping to our services / solutions      Targeting for 1 New customer testimonial per month.      3. column2: Digital Marketing  -  Engineering Services | Engineering Solutions Pune | Ideametrics    Digital Marketing Executive / Marketing Growth Hacker      We are looking for Digital Marketing Expert (Business Development) to work with us, to broaden our reach and put Ideametrics in front of clients and prospects. The role for current position is detailed below:      Graduation (Bachelor degree) in any stream with certified course in digital marketing.    Technical Skills Required:    Experience managing PPC, SEO and Affiliate programmes.      Strong understanding of current online/offline marketing concepts, strategies and best practices.      Experience in ecommerce, SEO, SMO, PPC, Social Media, Mobile Marketing, Email Marketing, Google Adwords, Web Analytics and Graphic Designing.      Previous experience in a similar digital marketing and business development role.    Roles / Responsibilities:    Primarily will be responsible for business development / acquisition of new clients using digital marketing, media spend, brand building and any other related vertical & also nurturing existing client relationships by maintaining a consultative selling approach for further business opportunities.      Use various channels email, online media, digital marketing to generate fresh leads for business.      Plan and execute Web, SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media, and display advertising campaigns.      Develop, execute, monitor and manage all aspects of paid performance marketing channels (SEM, Display, Affiliate, Email, Social, etc.) including the development of test plans, creative development, vendor management and campaign execution and analysis.      Design, build, and maintain our social media presence on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Youtube and other social media platforms.      Creating Social Media marketing strategies to create a brand name and raise awareness.      Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the insights. Also, track the conversions and improving the percentages and numbers.      Manage content for Social Media platforms, Website, Blogs and ad copies.      Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end - to - end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points.      Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies.      Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience and give suggestions on user experience on the company s website/ App (Includes design, content and usability).      Evaluate emerging technologies. Provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriate.      Increase the lifetime value of users through execution of a new Digital Communications Strategy using e - mail marketing, push notifications and in - app messaging.      Creating strategies to increase online traffic (revenue) to the organization s website/ App.      Collecting and evaluating customer feedback data.      Evaluating competitors Digital Marketing strategies and creating plans to overtake them.      Evaluating customer research, market conditions and competitor data.      To carry out market research and surveys to assess demand, brand positioning and awareness.      Planning, Budgeting & ROI Forecasting across Digital platforms.      Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs).      Get to work with best minds for problem - solving.      A fast - growing organization with real world problems to tackle.      Work for own products and be part of something exciting. Provides a platform to propose hypothesis  -  check hypothesis during implementation  -  refine.      Ability to learn what works and what doesn t, focus energy on what works and perfect the same.      The right candidate can look for bright future @ Ideametrics to grow with the organization.    Note: Accepted formats .doc, .docx, .pdf only.

column2: Octal Finance (P) Ltd is looking for LOAN EXECUTIVE to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As a Loan Executive, you will be responsible for managing the loan application process from start to finish      You will work closely with clients to understand their financial needs, assess their eligibility for various loan products, and guide them through the application process      Additionally, you will collaborate with internal teams such as underwriting, risk assessment, and customer service to ensure a smooth and efficient lending experience for clients      Your primary goal will be to facilitate the approval and disbursement of loans while maintaining compliance with regulatory requirements and company policies        Key Responsibilities:        Client Consultation: Meet with clients to discuss their financial objectives and assess their eligibility for loans      Loan Application Processing: Guide clients through the loan application process, collecting necessary documentation and information      Risk Assessment: Evaluate the creditworthiness of clients by analyzing financial documents, credit scores, and other relevant factors      Product Knowledge: Stay updated on various loan products offered by the institution and recommend the most suitable options for clients      Compliance: Ensure compliance with regulatory guidelines and internal policies throughout the loan origination process      Communication: Maintain regular communication with clients to provide updates on their loan applications and address any concerns or queries they may have      Collaboration: Coordinate with internal teams such as underwriting, legal, and customer service to expedite the loan approval process      Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with clients to encourage repeat business and referrals      Documentation: Prepare and review loan documents to ensure accuracy and completeness before submission for approval      Performance Tracking: Monitor key performance metrics related to loan origination, approval rates, and customer satisfaction, and implement strategies for improvement as needed

column2: A bit about us Kolo is a product that focuses on making home building a delightful experience by providing our users with real and valuable inspiration, products, people, and services. As an early-stage startup, we believe in being goal-oriented, growth-focused, and energetically agile so that we can cater to our user base of more than a million across different cities in India. Being user-centric and hands-on is our work mantra. Our vision is to be a one-stop shop for all home construction needs and to be an inevitable product for every homeowner. Job Description: We are seeking an energetic, communicative, and street-smart individual to join our team. We are  hiring a mass number of executive and lead-level business development associates from Cochin and the New Delhi Region .  As a BDA, you will play a crucial role in driving business growth by identifying and developing new client relationships.  Please Note : This is a field-based position, requiring you to be based out of Delhi/NCR /Cochin Regions and travel to meet clients within the designated territory.  Skillset Preference  :  **Someone who has done sales large ticket sales through Video Demo. (Edtech, Adtech)** Responsibilities: Research and identify potential clients in construction, retail, and advertising. Generate leads through online platforms, directories, and referrals. Cold call prospects to introduce our services and explore collaboration opportunities. Schedule meetings, conduct presentations, and nurture client relationships. Tailor solutions to client needs, prepare proposals, and close sales. Manage the entire sales cycle and maintain records in the CRM system. Collaborate with teams for seamless delivery of services. Expertise in B2B and inside sales . Self-Initiative and Qualifications: Proven experience in relevant fields is preferred. Strong communication, negotiation, and persuasion skills. Self-motivated, independent, and result-oriented.   Salary: 3 LPA - 8 LPA (Depending on interview performance and experience level) NP: Immediate -15 Days Work Location (In office ) : New Delhi / Cochin (Based on Candidate Preferences ) -Candidate Base Location . column2: About Neilsoft   Company Overview: At Neilsoft, our focus is to enhance our already impressive portfolio of Design to manufacture and design to construction  engineering software solutions. As a proud reseller of various renowned world-class products, we can address our clients??engineering software needs efficiently and give them maximum return on investment. Position Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Product Sales Specialist to join our team and drive the sales of Bluebeam software solutions. The ideal candidate will possess a strong understanding of the construction industry, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of exceeding sales targets. As a Product Sales Specialist, you will be responsible for identifying potential clients, cultivating relationships, and demonstrating the value of Bluebeam products to drive revenue growth. Designation:  Sales Executive Experience:  1 to 5 years Qualification:  BE in Mechanical / Civil Engineering Job Location:  Bangalore/Chennai /Mumbai/ Delhi Duties & Responsibilities: Develop and execute a sales plan to achieve sales targets and expand market presence for Bluebeam products. Identify and prospect new clients within the AEC industry, including architects, engineers, contractors, and project managers. Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients to ensure customer satisfaction and encourage repeat business. Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase the features and benefits of Bluebeam software solutions. Collaborate with internal teams, including marketing and technical support, to address customer needs and enhance the sales process. Complete      quotes in a timely fashion and accurately Maintain      accurate contact records. Regularly      follow up on quotes and sales leads Utilize      support staff to improve own effectiveness. Contributes      to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed. Keep      management informed by submitting activity and results reports, such as      daily call reports, weekly work plans, and monthly analysis. Make      good value judgment and represent Neilsoft in a positive &      professional way. Stay informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments to identify new opportunities for business growth. Prepare accurate sales forecasts, reports, and analysis to track performance and provide insights for future strategy. Participate in trade shows, conferences, and networking events to promote Bluebeam products and generate leads. column2: IndiaMART .com is India's largest Online B2B marketplace connecting global buyers with suppliers. Estd in 1996 and accredited with ISO 9001:2000 certification, IIL offers value-added services to its 1,000,000 members and over 5 million global buyers. Having over 4000 employees with a network of 75 offices across India, IIL offers a youthful and welfare-driven approach to career-building. Having an enviable track record of being the only Indian Dotcom company that has stayed profitable since launch, today IIL investors include Intel Capital and Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd. (Times Group). This position allows you to build new clients for the organization, and build rapport and trust in both yourself and the company. Our sales professionals focus on face-to-face sales presentations as they provide our clients an opportunity to know IndiaMART & value addition IndiaMART can bring to their respective businesses. The position holder will be an individual contributor, responsible for driving sales activities within the assigned region.  Key Responsibilities:  To generate leads from a given database & Identify decision makers within targeted leads and initiate the sales process. To penetrate all targeted accounts and originate sales opportunities for the company's products and services. To set up and deliver sales presentations, and product/service demonstrations on daily basis. To ensure systematic follow-up with the client organizations to take the sales pitch to time-bound closure. Ensure that all payments are collected as per the company's payment terms. Critical Skills of Suitable Candidates Preferred candidate profile: ONLY MALE CANDIDATES. ANY- Bachelor's degree - WITH MINIMUM 1YR EXPERIENCE- IN ANY FIELD. MBA FRESHERS are also eligible. 65% OR ABOVE IN 10th and 12th &  GRADUATION is MANDATORY. Candidates between 22-28 years old to be preferred. Excellent verbal communication skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Driven and results-oriented.  Perks and benefits Competitive salary and benefits package. Attractive weekly based incentive. Opportunity to work with a talented team of professionals. Promotion in 1year based on performance Attractive incentives & weekly basis incentive.

column2: Job Title :  Sales Executive-Liabilities Function :  Sales Products:  CASA, FD, RD & LI Location : ?Kolkata, Siliguri, Guwahati. Reporting Manager : ?Branch Sales Manager Qualification :  Any Graduate(Mandatory) Experience :  Both Experience & Fresher (Banking & NBFC sector) Age :  Below than 32 for Experience & Below 28 then for Fresher. Note:  It is Field Work and Open Market. It is On-Roll Job KEY RESPONSIBILTIES: Customer Acquisition:  The primary responsibility is to identify potential customers, approach them, and persuade them to open CASA accounts, invest in insurance products, or deposit money in FD and RD accounts. Product Knowledge:  Sales executives should have in-depth knowledge of the various banking products they are selling. They should be able to explain the features, benefits, and terms and conditions to potential customers. Customer Relationship Management:  Building and maintaining strong relationships with customers is crucial. This involves understanding their financial needs, providing personalized solutions, and addressing any concerns or queries. Sales Targets:  Meeting or exceeding sales targets is often a key performance indicator. Sales executives are expected to set achievable sales goals and work towards achieving them. Lead Generation:  Actively generating leads through various channels such as cold calling, referrals, networking, and marketing campaigns to expand the customer base. Sales Reporting:  Keeping detailed records of sales activities, customer interactions, and outcomes. Providing regular reports to management on sales performance. Training and Development:  Continuously improving product knowledge and sales skills through training provided by the bank or other sources. Customer Education:  Educating customers about the benefits and risks associated with different banking products, helping them make informed decisions. Note: - If you or any reference who are interested in this profile can Apply or share his CV on 9151803004 WhatsApp number.  Call and WhatsApp timing is 10:00AM to 06:00PM

column2: As Home Loan Sales Officer, candidate will leverage their expertise and sales idea to give guidance and assistance to existing and new customers in the open market from Kurnool regarding bank home loans and financial products.        Responsibilities for Loan Sales Jobs in Kurnool:         Manage home loan sales and distribution through cross-channel and open market channels.         Ensure consistent growth by acquiring new customers from Kurnool.         Supervise and expand the Direct Sales team, with a focus on increasing productivity.         Implement marketing strategies and capitalize on catchment areas.         Meet with High Net Worth (HNI) clients and explain various products related to Loan against Property, Housing Finance, and Working Capital.         Foster relationships with builders and establish tie-ups to target primary markets.         Coordinate and oversee project approvals from builders within Kurnool.         Generate additional revenue through cross-selling of BFSI products such as insurance, CASA, and credit cards.         Responsible for end-to-end processing of cases and keeping customers updated on the status. column2: vaccine on wheels is looking for Public Relationship Officer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      The ideal candidate will have a passion for building and maintaining positive relationships with the public, media, and stakeholders      The Public Relations Officer will play a crucial role in enhancing our organization's image and fostering a positive public perception        Responsibilities:        Media Relations:Cultivate and maintain positive relationships with journalists, editors, and key media outlets      Draft press releases, media kits, and other materials to promote organizational events, initiatives, and achievements      Public Communication:Develop and implement communication strategies to effectively convey the organization's messages to the public      Respond to inquiries from the media and the public in a timely and professional manner      Brand Management:Work collaboratively with marketing teams to ensure consistent branding and messaging      Monitor and manage the organization's online presence, including social media channels      Event Coordination:Plan and coordinate public relations events, press conferences, and product launches      Collaborate with internal teams to ensure events align with organizational goals      Crisis Management:Develop and implement crisis communication plans to protect and enhance the organization's reputation      Act as a spokesperson during times of crisis, addressing concerns and providing accurate information      Stakeholder Engagement:Build and maintain positive relationships with key stakeholders, including community leaders, government officials, and industry partners      Seek opportunities for partnerships and collaborations to enhance the organization's image

column2: To sell insurance policies by generating leads though retail distribution model and serving existing customers or leads that are received from the channel, apart from sourcing business         Roles Responsibilities            Increase the top of funnel by driving period BTL activates, generating referral form prospect customers to generate a bigger prospect base.      Maximize virtual connects with the qualified prospects using various digital platforms along with other social media platforms.      Adopt need based selling (Tailor make recommendation based on customer s profile) and assist and coordinate with customers to facilitate smooth policy insurance.      Rigorous and timely follow - up on all prospects that are in work in progress stage.     Update prospect information and track performance on lead management system (LMS) / VYMO     Ensure that all procedural requirement for policy issuance are complete and correct. column2: Executive Client   Acquisition Location:   Chennai Department:   NSD   (New   Sales   Division) About   Us: IndiaMART   is   India's   largest   online   B2B   marketplace , connecting buyers with sellers. Over last 25 years, we have been continuously evolving our platform using sophisticated business-enablement technologies  to   make   doing business   easy . Our credo,  'Bada   Aasaan   Hai, ' appropriately depicts our approach. With 76 million product offerings and  6.7   million   responsive supplier  base, we provides ease and convenience to our  138   million   buyers . Our IPO was a thumping success in 2019, reaffirming the trust of our users and investors alike. Headquartered in Noida, we have 3,000+ employees located across 32 offices in the country. Why   Join   IndiaMART   : Our greatest assets are the IndiaMARTians. For our employees personal andprofessional development, we provide a variety of career advancement opportunities as well as learning and development activities. They get the benefit of working with India's largest online B2B marketplace along with a  fast-paced   career   progression . Potential employees can advance to the leadership roles within five years of their work tenure. We have more than 500 employees working with us who are testimony to this program. The superheroes take advantage of our cutting-edge  I-LEAP   program , which allows employees to  "Learn   as   they   Work   .  Our Superlative Incentive Programs, arguably among the best in business today, allows them to earn more as they do more. Key   Success   factors   for   an   Individual: ??Passion and drive to excel ??Hunger to learn and grow ??Customer Orientation What   the   Role   offers: This position allows you to build new clients for the organization, build rapportand trust  in both yourself and the company. Our top sales professionals are passionate and  driven in order to produce top results, all the while maintaining integrity. Our sales professionals focus on face-to-face sales presentations as they provide our clients an opportunity to know IndiaMART & value addition IndiaMART can bring to their respective business. Position holder will be anindividual contributor, responsible to drive sales activities within assigned region. Key   Responsibilities: ??To generate leads from given database & Identify decision makers within targeted leadsand initiate the sales process. ??To penetrate all targeted accounts and originate sales opportunities for the company's products and services. ??To set up and deliver sales presentations, product/service demonstrations on daily basis. ??To ensure systematic follow-up with the client organizations to take the sales pitch to time-bound closure. ??To ensure that all payments are collected as per the company's payment terms. Critical   Skills   of   a   Suitable   Candidates: ??Quick thinking and problem-solving skills ??Excellent verbal communication skills ??Excellent active listening skills ??Innovative vision and foresight to anticipate and create new opportunities that resonate with your customer. You   Can   Apply   if   you   possess: ??At least 12 months of relevant sales experience. ??MBA freshers can also apply ??Should have a laptop and bike (with valid RC and DL) ??MBA or any Equivalent Degree (at least 65% throughout)

column2: Roles & Responsibilities: Make telephone calls to the leads assigned by the system to validate the leads and present information on the Promilo franchise. Generate the lead through multiple sales & marketing activities Pre-qualify the leads by asking questions about their location preference, profiles, interests, etc. Present information to the qualified leads about the Promilo franchise model, the investment required to start and run a FICO & FIFO model, etc.; Conclude calls by sending the prospects emails/messages with links for further information on the franchise opportunity. Capture and document information on the leads obtained through the telecalls in the system. Enter and update prospects information in the database. Schedule and make a follow-up call to assess the level of interest of the prospects and to qualify them for the next stage of the face-to-face meeting. Send requests to prospects for filling up the Expression of Interest (EOI) forms to collect information regarding their funding ability. Schedule face-to-face meetings for prospects with concerned Relationship Managers (RM). Hand out the ROI-Sheet, the Term-Sheet, and the Agreement Draft to the franchisee candidates approved by the RM / Head of Franchise Development. Answer queries, provide information, assist the prospects with personal visits and provide support as required.

column1: Business Development Executive| Propella Consulting Group - Remote
column2: Propella Consulting Group is a Senior Management & Leadership Hiring firm which provides its services to companies within Manufacturing, Logistics, Technology, E-Commerce, Automotive & various other Industries. Propella is an exclusive and unique provider of staff who forms a dedicated team of Account Managers / Executives around a specific client to strategically build a culturally viable and high-performing team.  As a Business Development Executive, you will be responsible for driving lead closure, client acquisition, and conducting market research to identify new business opportunities. You will play a key role in expanding our client base and achieving revenue targets.  Responsibilities:  Thorough market research across various industries and map out various sub industries within. Create a list of companies within each sub industry sector and identify them as large customers, mid cap etc. and further segregate based on industry. Create a new highly researched list of new potential customers daily along with names and contact details of decision makers, i.e., CEO/ CHRO/ Talent Acquisition Head etc. Connect with decision makers on LinkedIn and business-related social media platforms. Cold call potential customers and provide them with a short but effective understanding of Propella's services, our USP, terms etc. Consistently follow up with potential customers at a mutually agreed time. Email presentations, conduct zoom meetings along with delivery managers (if required), negotiate terms and sign up based on mutually agree-able terms. Once the customer terms are signed up, the clients shall be passed on to the delivery / client engagement team. REQUIREMENT :  1. Excellent Communication Skills & Presentation Skills.  2. Great People Management Skills  3. Attention to detail, consistency & particular.  4. Problem Solving Skills  WHY WORK WITH PROPELLA   Great high energy and high integrity work environment.   Lovely team-oriented culture.   Lucrative incentive structure - payable monthly and yearly.   Autonomous work environment.   All team members are involved during strategy meets and inputs respected.   Well-charted out career progression plan and growth opportunities

column2: We are looking for . was established in 1983 and is into the business of Electronic Security Systems. We are the exclusive distributor in India of M/s    Jablotron   , a world leader in Intrusion Alarm Systems. We work with Business Partners all over India, who are trained and supported by us and who are committed to ensuring that the electronic protection solutions that they provide to protect the end customers are the best.       We impart world - class training to candidates that we hire. We are currently hiring people who have the ability to work alongside the best and brightest minds in the industry to learn and make our business partners feel confident and safe working with us.     For over 30 years we have offered diverse security solutions to a varied mix of well - known customers. Now, keeping in view the growing crime graph and expanding market, we are priming our Alarm Systems division that trains and supports our business partners. Our systems may be used for securing homes of high net - worth Individuals (HNIs), Commercial Complexes, Banks, Institutions, Industrial and Government applications.     Installing fault - free intruder alarms is high precision work where the margin for error is 0%! So, training forms the most important core of our activity.     Few places offer as many learning opportunities as Kawach to gain knowledge in this specialized field. People who we have trained and have worked for us in the past have done well in life, with many now working for multinational companies in India and abroad. You get to work in a stimulating environment and get rewarded for outstanding performance. From research to consulting, services, solutions and products the breadth and spread of our product range offers career building opportunities for the right candidates.     You will learn new skills, work across different disciplines and can even move into newer roles within the company. This is possible with our caring professional development and training guidance. Kawach offers a healthy environment to work and progress in.     To ensure your overall success we will also train you in soft - skills to interact with highly placed individuals and successful organizations to carry out the above activities, t!     If selected, you will be trained in the system design and rendering of technical support on the most modern Electronic Protection Systems including our latest line - up of Addressable GSM based Intrusion Detection & Alarm Systems, Perimeter Security Fencing, Analog & IP based Video Surveillance, Card & Fingerprint based Access Control Systems, Electronic Guard Patrol Systems etc. Apart from the technical training, we will also improve your soft skills, as well as, train you in high trust selling.     Skills that are only taught in the best tech and business schools.     We are looking for Electronics/Electrical Diploma and Degree Holders.     We require qualified people, who we can train so that they can skillfully help our business partners to install and maintain high - tech electronic protection systems.     Be a fresher or have a maximum of one year of work experience     Not have any convictions or pending criminal proceeding/s going on against them     Should be willing to work with own hands      Have a positive and Never - Say - Die attitude     Have the knowledge of basic principles of time management & setting priorities.     Have the ability to learn to plan, schedule, handle and monitor his/her assigned work.     Believe in teamwork and have strong interpersonal and communication skills.     Have a nature to do high quality work that people remember him/her by.     Have a problem - solving mindset with multi - tasking abilities.     Have working knowledge of MS Excel, MS Word, MS PowerPoint, G - Suite, Google Drive     Possess a SmartPhone and a Two Wheeler (bike or scooter) to travel within the NCR, so as to reach our customers in the shortest time.     Training on Electronic Security Systems (Intrusion, Access Control, CCTV and Fire Alarm Systems)     After training, a salary path that is better than the industry average if you have the right qualifications, skills set and attitude.     Statutory benefits such as PF, ESI, Bonus, EL, CL, Gratuity etc.     A career path with incremental training, salary and incentive structure     Reimbursement of fuel & maintenance expenses for your vehicle
column11: GSM, Fire alarm system, Analog, Security systems, Consulting, System design, Electronic security, Powerpoint, CCTV, Technical support

column2: A technical sales engineer combines technical knowledge with sales skills. The emphasis of the work varies depending on the level of technical knowledge needed to sell products and services and respond effectively to clients queries.     To ensure clients and their own company's needs are met, technical sales engineers liaise regularly with other members of the sales team and colleagues from a range of departments, such as research, development, design, purchasing, production, and quality, as well as senior company managers.     Typical work activities     Tasks typically involve:     searching for new clients who might benefit from company products or services and maximising customer potential in designated regions;     travelling to visit potential clients;     developing and growing long-term relationships with customers;     managing and interpreting customer requirements - speaking with clients to understand, anticipate and meet their needs;     persuading clients that a product or service best satisfies their needs in terms of quality, price and delivery;     calculating client quotations;     negotiating tender and contract terms to meet both client and company needs;     negotiating and closing sales by agreeing terms and conditions;     offering after-sales support services;     administering client accounts;     analysing costs and sales;     preparing reports for head office;     meeting regular sales targets;     recording and maintaining client contact data;     coordinating sales projects;     supporting marketing activities by attending trade shows, conferences and other marketing events;     making technical presentations and demonstrating how a product meets client needs;     providing pre-sales technical assistance and product education;     liaising with other members of the sales team and other technical experts;     solving client problems;     helping in the design of custom-made products;     providing training and producing support material for other members of the sales team.   Technical sales engineer: Entry requirements    Candidates need to show evidence of the following:     a solid technical background;     sound judgement and good business sense;     teamworking ability;     the ability to build relationships with clients quickly;     analytical and problem-solving skills;     resilience and tenacity;     independence.       Experience Requirements:           Bachelor's degree/Diploma in Electrical Engineering or Electronics and Communication or Instrumentation or BSc Electronics.     2-3 years sales experience and/or design engineering     Distribution experience preferred     Must have excellent written and verbal communication/interpersonal skills     Requires a self-starter who has the ability to prioritize, multi-task and deal with pressure     Time management, organization and customer service skills     Excellent presentation design and delivery skills as well as ability to drive programs and manage projects     Ability to sell, negotiate, persuade and influence.     Demonstrated ability to build relationships at all levels of customer and supplier
column11: Interpersonal skills, Technical Assistant, Time management, Analytical, Technical sales, Presales, Instrumentation, Support services, After sales support, Customer service

column2: Business Development Manager    Full Time    A talented and ambitious Business Development Manager is required to represent Qbytez to grow and establish new business and customers. As we continue to expend into the global marketplace with a focus on Destination Marketing, a highly driven and motivated Business Development Manager is required.     The successful candidate will have strong interpersonal and communication skills, with a focus on organization and enhanced multitasking abilities covering across both English and Middle East marketplaces. B2B sales, marketing and strategic analysis are important aspects of the position, along with exceptional negotiation skills and the ability to close deals.     Reporting the Global CEO, you will have relevant sales and marketing experience within the target marketplaces. This is a full-time position, with international travel required to fulfill the job role.         Essential:         Generate leads and keep in regular contact with existing prospects, whilst maintaining existing client accounts and driving their businesses forward         Present to senior decision makers within prospective and existing clients (MDs and CEOs)         Develop targeted long-term marketing and new business strategies to grow Qbytez s reputation and presence within the market         Work closely with senior management to refine how the business presents itself to fully explore and grow in new markets         Regularly reporting on performance of sales leads and marketing activities to senior management against set monthly targets and project budgets         Responsible for overseeing team members to deliver on agreed projects, on time and to budget         Research and analysis of industry trends and technology to identify key areas for expansion and development for new and existing business         Develop best in class client proposals, targeted pitch decks and other sales and marketing campaigns/activities as needed         Grow and maintain relationships with new and existing customers as the dedicated key contact for client accounts         Provide assistance and support in development of commercial sales contracts, adhering to law established rules and guidelines, in both Arabic and English         Assist the finance team in preparing taxation reports and annual taxation paperwork         Knowledgeable and abreast of the latest industry and best practice standards in marketing and social media           Desirable:         Proven working experience within Business Development or Marketing role with exceptional Project Management capabilities         Self-starter who is commercially minded, target-driven, process oriented and motivated         Proficient in English spoken and written forms         BA/B.Sc. in Marketing, Media and Communications or equivalent. A Master s degree in those fields is preferable.         Excellent communication, presentation and negotiation skills, particularly within the target marketplace         Exceptional attention to detail         You will have experience of building relationships with senior commercial and technical decision-makers and ideally possess strong personal contacts and relationships with key players         Excellent time management, an individual who thrives on working autonomously, but can also work well within a team environment         Experience with CRM systems and processes         Ability to quickly adapt and respond to changing situations, whilst remaining calm and composed under pressure         Strong understanding of client cultures to maintain and grow new and existing relationships with clients and prospects.         The ideal candidate will be determined, outgoing, positive, articulate and diplomatic           Why Choose Qbytez?         Develop your career with one of the leading companies in town         Work with some of the regions biggest brands         Develop your skill set in a challenging and rewarding environment with R&D time and personal development time         Budget towards books, training and personal development         Competitive salary, bonus and incentive schemes         Work in a friendly atmosphere where our team of experts is always ready to help         Regular social and training events         Cycle to work scheme         Hot drinks and filtered water         Work in a grade A environment located in Cyber Park, Kozhikode

column2: The Sales Manager for Shivaami Cloud Services Pvt Ltd. will be a key player in the SMB/Enterprise Segment for the assigned Region Direct Sales, focusing on driving the adoption of Google and Microsoft Cloud (SAAS) solutions. This role requires a blend of business acumen and technical sales expertise to establish Shivaami Cloud Services in the Enterprise Segment. The ideal candidate for the Sales Manager role at Shivaami Cloud Services Pvt Ltd. will have extensive experience in cloud services sales, strong customer relationship management skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with partners and internal teams. They should be proactive, independent, and capable of driving business growth while ensuring customer satisfaction and operational excellence. Office Timings:  Monday to Friday - 10:00 AM to 7:30 PM.  Preferred Candidate Profile: Experience : Minimum 1 year of experience in direct Cloud Services and Solutions sales. Proven track record of delivering sales pipelines at large enterprise accounts through leading outbound prospecting teams. Experience in selling Cloud services or SAAS, particularly Google/ Microsoft/ AWS Cloud services, is highly desirable. Skills and Competencies : Strong background in direct sales and key account management within the cloud computing sector. Proficiency in creating and iterating sales development processes, methodologies, campaigns, hiring profiles, training, and enablement. Excellent leadership skills, demonstrating team player qualities and effective communication in precise and concise language. Ability to work independently, build relationships, and respond promptly. Exemplary written and spoken English skills for business communication. Ability to deliver accurate, nuanced, direct, and kind messaging. Behavioral Attributes : Leadership as a behavior, not just a formal role, embodies the core values of Shivaami in daily conduct.   Key Responsibilities: Revenue and Market Share Growth : Drive revenue and market share in top accounts within the West/North/South Region. Meet or exceed quarterly revenue targets. Develop and execute comprehensive account plans to achieve business objectives. Customer Relationship Management : Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction. Develop long-term strategic relationships with CXOs in key accounts. Conduct mass presentations and demos of Google and Microsoft Cloud solutions. Engage in pre-sales documentation and avoid reliance on pre-sales teams for initial calls. Partnership and Collaboration : Work with ISVs/OEMs/Google BDMs to extend reach and drive adoption. Collaborate with Google/Microsoft teams, planning jointly every week. Contract and Deal Management : Manage contract negotiations effectively. Share prospect feedback with the leadership team, suggesting additional services to expand the portfolio. Marketing and Sales Enablement : Work closely with the Marketing team to launch account-specific plans, workshops, and engagement programs. Enable the sales team with necessary collateral, coordinate pre-sales efforts, and assist in new customer acquisition. Market Intelligence : Gather and analyze market intelligence related to customers, principals, and competitors. Build account-specific databases and contacts through social media and web research. Collect data on account buying behavior and stay informed on domain/industry/government policies and technology trends.

column2: is someone (or in certain cases there may be multiple team leaders) who provides guidance, instruction, direction, leadership to a group of other individuals (the team) for the purpose of achieving a key result or group of aligned results. The team lead reports to a project manager (overseeing several teams). The team leader monitors the quantitative and qualitative result that is to be achieved. The leader works with the team membership.   The team membership may not directly report or answer to the team leader, (who is very often a senior member of the organization but may or may not be a manager) but would be expected to provide support to the team leader and other team members in achieving the team s goals.   A good team leader listens constructively to the membership and to the customer(s) of the results that the team is charged with delivering.   The responsibilities of a team lead vary greatly between organizations, but usually includes some responsibility for team building and ensuring teamwork. The term is used to emphasize the cooperative nature of a team, in contrast to a typical command structure, where the head of a team would be its commander .   KIPL is looking for such a dedicated Team Leader who can manage the entire sales / marketing team.   Desired Profile for Team Leader    Male / Female Post Graduate qualifications in Sales & Marketing in IT / Web Services.    A good communicator with strong ability to implement marketing plans.    Confident, Convincing & Smart.    3 - 5 yrs. Experience in Marketing / Sales    Candidates are able to present the company presentation and demo in all concerns.    Pleasing Personality added with good communication skills is must.     Good knowledge of Delhi / NCR s industrial topography is important    Candidates with own conveyances is preferred    Candidates with own laptop is preferred    Ability to understand and present the IT services and solutions is a must.    Confident to meet people and build relationships.    Convenient in traveling      Managing Entire Team including Tele - callers and marketing / sales executives    Conducting demos & educating Sales Team for proper work orientation      Keep track of all activities for the team    Managing / Creating Business Plans, Goals and other particulars to achieve the company monthly target revenue with Business Manager.    Must be a good listener    proposing proper solutions, implementing proposals, negotiate and finalize the deals for packaged solutions and specific customized solutions for improvement in product / services.    Achieving targets assigned to as per experience and caliber    Managing / checking logs in CRM all the reporting exceutives    Handling and managing client base after sales    Maintaining customer relationship via phone, email, meeting,letter or any other means of communication    In depth knowledge and experience in the Sales & Marketing Segment.      Writing correspondence related to special events, advertising, and rentals      Create an environment oriented to trust, open communication, creative thinking, and cohesive team effort    Provide the team with a vision of the project objectives    Motivate and inspire team members    Lead by setting a good example (role model) behavior consistent with words    Coach and help develop team members; help resolve dysfunctional behavior    Facilitate problem solving and collaboration    Strive for team consensus and win - win agreements    Ensure discussions and decisions lead toward closure    Maintain healthy group dynamics    Intervene when necessary to aid the group in resolving issues    Assure that the team members have the necessary education and training to effectively participate on the team    Encourage creativity, risk - taking, and constant improvement    Recognize and celebrate team and team member accomplishments and exceptional performance  Interested applicants can fill out the given form to apply for the same. column2: Position : Travel Sales Executive (Mice/School Sales) Experience : 2-4 Years. Job Location : Hyderabad, Gachibowli Work from Office for 5 Days. No of Position :2   About Engage Us Travel (EUT):   We are an ISO 9001:2015 certified Travel Start up. We focus on providing B2B Corporate travel services and offsite team building for corporate clients, and luxury holidays for Indian High-Net-Worth individuals. For more details Visit : https://engageustravel.com   About the Role :   This high-performance sales role is ideal for someone ambitious, willing to take big risks, and eager to continuously challenge themselves. We seek individuals with unwavering dedication, exceptional determination, and a strong work ethic, all of which will undoubtedly be rewarded.   Candidates must have extensive knowledge of industries that primarily focus on employee incentive trips, dealer trips, and meetings and events, both internationally and domestically. Candidates must have a strong understanding of product destinations, including hotel categories, transportation options, and sightseeing opportunities. They should also have extensive experience in understanding client requirements, providing tailored advice, and successfully closing deals.   Need to generate leads (cold calling/ social media etc) and nurture all prospect. Own the complete Sales Cycle : Lead generation, client meeting and presentation, proposal sharing with client, negotiation, Invoice generation & closure of deal and Payment collection Post Sales activates  Servicing client, travelling with group of clients (group size more than 40+) Complete ownership of Pre & Post sales activites. Must have strong connections and influence within client industries to convert sales for our firm. Understand client requirements and offer appropriate tour packages. Achieve assigned sales targets. Responsible for generating revenue for the company, evaluated based on monthly and quarterly revenue generation. Onboard new clients monthly. Meet targets consistently. Generate new business through leisure and corporate sales. Driven by hardcore sales. Responsibilities include: Generate Revenue on Monthly basis Creating bookings/reservations, preparing itineraries, tour costing, hotel bookings, and customizing domestic and international tours. Providing excellent customer service, handling escalations post-booking, and ensuring appropriate resolutions. Coordinating with the operations team. Proficiency in MS Word and Excel. Experience in domestic, inbound, and international tours. Making informed decisions on what to sell based on customer requirements, thinking outside the box, and possessing strong selling capabilities. Sound knowledge of costing and itinerary preparation related to travel. Preparing customized itineraries for international and domestic packages. Proficiency with travel software. Strong follow-up skills.     Preferred candidate profile Must have experience in MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, and Exhibitions) sales. School Sales, Selling educational packages to Schools - good contacts with all Schools in Telangana & other locations Must have good contacts for all Industries for Mice sales. Proven track record of independently closing deals for groups of over 100 people, especially for international travel with reputable corporations. Corporate travel sales experience is essential.   Other Skills :   Must be proficient in operating Computers and Microsoft office (Word, Excel, Power point, etc.) Fluency in English essential. Should have Good Communication Skills (written and verbal) and customer service skills. Should be Honest / Hard Working / Punctual. Self-motivated, resourceful, ability and willingness to work in a multi-tasking environment. Local language speaking added advantage Qualification: Any Graduate or Degree in Hospitality, Travel, Tourism, Business or relevant field will be an advantage     Salary : Fixed + Lucrative Incentive
