column2: About ProYuga & iB Cricket: ProYuga  develops transformative products  in Virtual, Augmented and Mixed reality ( VR, AR, MR ), with iB Cricket being one of its flagship products. iB Cricket is the  World's Most Advanced & Highly Immersive Virtual Reality Cricket  where one can experience playing cricket in World Class Stadiums. iB Cricket was awarded the  Best Startup of the Year - VR Technology ??by Entrepreneur India in 2019. iB Cricket has partnered with  8 IPL teams  across multiple seasons as their  Official VR Gaming Partners. Till date, iB Cricket has thousands of customers spread across  10+ countries.  iB Cricket is the  Top Rated VR Cricket game  in the Oculus(Meta) store with a rating of ??4.5/5 ?? Know more about iB Cricket : Website: ib.cricket/about-us/ iB Cricket Trailer: https://youtu.be/op7O-zLA71A What will you be doing? Lead Generation:   Collaborate with the marketing team to identify and follow up on potential leads within the target sectors. Utilize various channels, including social media, industry events, and direct outreach, to identify and engage potential business partners. Qualification Calls:   Conduct thorough qualification calls to understand the business needs and goals of potential clients. Gather information on the existing setup, target audience, and potential integration of iB Cricket into their business. Direct Meetings and Demonstrations:   Schedule and organize face-to-face or virtual meetings with qualified leads. Conduct engaging product demonstrations, highlighting the benefits and features of iB Cricket Business Edition. Address any queries or concerns raised during the meetings and tailor the presentation to the specific needs of each prospect. Follow-ups:   Maintain regular communication with prospects through follow-up calls, emails, and other communication channels. Provide additional information, materials, or resources as needed to facilitate the decision-making process. Sales Closure:   Work towards closing sales deals by addressing objections, negotiating terms, and aligning the iB Cricket solution with the client's business objectives. Collaborate with the legal and finance teams to finalize contracts and ensure a smooth transition to the implementation phase. Client Relationship Management:   Build and nurture long-term relationships with clients to encourage repeat business and referrals. Gather feedback on the product and relay insights to the product development team for continuous improvement. Be adaptable to take on redefined roles and responsibilities as needed to support the company's strategies and overall success. What are we looking for? Proven experience in B2B sales, preferably in the entertainment, real estate, Insurance and banking sectors. An individual with excellent communication skills in English and presentation skills Ability to understand client needs and tailor solutions accordingly. A reliable and trustworthy individual who can quickly build rapport Growth mindset with an appetite to learn quickly Desire to work in a high-growth startup environment Enthusiastic to learn, grow and be a part of a cutting-edge technology company Languages Known: Native speaker of Hindi or  Kannada. Very Good Proficiency in English is expected. Previous Work Experience: Minimum experience of 2-3 years  in B2B sales or similar roles. Salary: 4.5 LPA - 9 LPA Working Days: Should be flexible to travel within the city and to other cities, based on the requirement 6-Day Week

Over last 25 years, we have been continuously evolving our platform using sophisticated business-enablement technologies  to   make   doing business   easy . Our credo,  'Bada   Aasaan   Hai, ' appropriately depicts our approach. With 76 million product offerings and  6.7   million   responsive supplier  base, we provides ease and convenience to our  138   million   buyers . Why   Join   IndiaMART   : Our greatest assets are the IndiaMARTians. For our employees personal andprofessional development, we provide a variety of career advancement opportunities as well as learning and development activities. They get the benefit of working with India's largest online B2B marketplace along with a  fast-paced   career   progression . Potential employees can advance to the leadership roles within five years of their work tenure. We have more than 500 employees working with us who are testimony to this program. The superheroes take advantage of our cutting-edge  I-LEAP   program , which allows employees to  "Learn   as   they   Work   .  Our Superlative Incentive Programs, arguably among the best in business today, allows them to earn more as they do more. IndiaMART   InterMESH   Ltd. 6th floor, Tower 2, Assotech Business Cresterra, Plot No.22, Sec 135, Noida-201305, Uttar Pradesh, India. Our sales professionals focus on face-to-face sales presentations as they provide our clients an opportunity to know IndiaMART & value addition IndiaMART can bring to their respective business. column1: Tracxn - SAVP - Business Development - SaaS Sales - EMEA (10 - 14 yrs)
column2: About Tracxn: Tracxn is a Bangalore based product company providing a research and deal sourcing platform for Venture Capital, Private Equity, Corp Devs & professionals working around the startup ecosystem. We are a team of 750+ working professionals serving customers across the globe. Our clients include Funds like Andreessen Horowitz, Sequoia Capital, Accel Partners, NEA; and Large Corporates such as ING, Societe Generale, LG and Royal Bank of Canada. We are funded by SAIF Partners, Accel, Sequoia. Angel investors like Ratan Tata, Nandan Nilekani, Sachin Bansal and Binny Bansal have also invested in Tracxn. Position: We are looking for a seasoned sales professional with a proven track record to join us as  Senior AVP - Business Development  for EMEA Market This role is a senior management role. You will be responsible for building & managing a high performing sales team which will directly report to you. This is a  front end sales role . You will be directly responsible for driving  end-to-end sales of our SaaS product from prospecting to closure . You will be expected to sell to a diverse set of clients like Venture Capital funds, Fortune 1000 Corporates, Investment Banks, Accelerators, Incubators etc. The position is based out of Bangalore, where you will work closely with your team and reach out to prospects remotely, over calls, emails and video conferences. Please note the role does not involve traveling to clients location.  B2B Sales / SaaS Sales experience is mandatory The timings for this position are 12:.00 pm to 10.00 pm for the EMEA market.  Key Responsibilities: Develop a 360 understanding of Tracxns product ,customer categories and competitors Develop a thorough understanding of Tracxns products and offerings Understand the different categories of customers we cater to. Understand how companies in these categories are driving innovation, investment decisions.  Understand how Tracxn creates value for these companies. Understand how they use Tracxns platform and keep identifying newer use cases Monitor competitors activity globally. Stay updated about price points, new products/offerings launched Stay updated on market developments that may have a direct impact on the business Initiatives by existing and/or target customers. For ex. A corporate client whose Corp Dev team is working with us launches a startup incubator New initiatives that may impact the market as a whole. For ex. a large corporate in a traditional industry sets up an external innovation team. This may lead to other corporates in this industry setting up similar teams Regulatory changes which may lead to innovation Understand and implement the Sales Playbook  Thoroughly understand and implement the Sales Playbook - A sales guide created by the Central Business Team. This includes whom to reach out to, the sales pitch, and the mailers among other things. Notify the Central Business Team if anything is missing/not working out and needs to be updated. Sales playbook includes following:  Allocate accounts to your team members Prioritize customers on the basis of relevance of their use case, sales conversion ratios, potential market size , engagement with Tracxns marketing initiatives etc Re-allocate accounts to the team members maximizing the chances of conversion by leveraging individual traits like subject matter expertise, exposure to the geo, and past track record of your team Ensure inbound leads are serviced in a timely fashion Ensure all leads are reached out in a timely fashion. Plan for contingencies such as Lead owner on leave, more leads assigned to a person than he can handle, multiple owners of a lead etc  Ensure the team is using the Sales Playbook to reach out to leads in the most optimal way. Train and assist the team to customize the sales pitch according to the prospects and the situation Ensure healthy sales pipeline through outbound  Train and help the team members in generating demos via outbound - sending cold emails to the relevant contacts in the accounts assigned to them. Ensure the Sales Playbook is used by the team Ensure regular activity in all the accounts assigned. Re-allocate accounts with no activity from salesperson, new joinees, salesperson leaving the team etc.  Take responsibility of closures for your territory Completely own a territory and take responsibility of closures  You will be individually assigned accounts as well which you will be required to close You will be responsible for the closures of your team as well and ensure that sales closures are happening at their end as well Supervise and proactively assist team members where your intervention may be required to close the sale. Brainstorm and customize the sales pitch according to the prospect Train and help the team members in preparing for the demos. Review the pre-demos notes filled by the sales team and suggest improvements Train and help the team members on how to push for closure once demo is done Manage Sales Operations - Conduct 1-on-1s with your team on a daily basis.  Solve closure related customer queries. For ex: Missing use case, Pricing issues etc. Help team members in closure if needed  Review the work done by the team, including new reach-outs done, follow ups made, demos given, sales pipeline created. Provide pointed feedback and improvement areas on the approach, quality and throughput of the work done. Take feedback from top management on decisions taken.  Build and Manage your team Actively involved in hiring and building the team Identify training needs of your team members to reach their peak potential. Employ different training and mentoring methods for different team members, as needed Responsible for performance management within the team including appraisals, monthly ratings, discipline, etc Track conversion funnel and provide strategic input Closely monitor the conversion funnel of your team - sales pipeline, leads reached out to, demos set up, post demo follow ups, and closures Regular updates for the Leadership Team and the Board on key sales metrics including new customers, renewals, churns, and growth rate etc. Identify the bottlenecks and update management Analyze issues raised by customers. Provide feedback to Product, Business and Customer Success teams to improve the customer life cycle and experience Improve the Sales Playbook Work with the Central Business Team and pick projects to help improve the Sales Playbook. You can work on mailers (reach-out, follow-ups), collaterals, pitch across customer categories  Evolve Sales Playbook after understanding latest global practices, feedback from the BD team, interaction with the customers, past experience etc.  Here is what we are looking for:  10+ years of strong work experience in Enterprise/Institutional Sales/Account Management (experience in cross-border Remote Sales / Inside Sales / Concept selling is a plus) B2B / SaaS Sales experience is mandatory At least 3 years in sales closures Prior team handling experience is preferred Flexible, organized and able to handle competing priorities Ready to relocate to Bangalore (5 Days Work from Office) What can you expect at Tracxn? Meritocracy Driven, Candid Culture. No Politics.  Like Minded Intellectually Curious Colleagues. High Paced Learning. Continuous Mentorship to help Achieve Peak Potential Learn to Manage Multi-Tier Reporting Founders Neha Singh (ex-Sequoia, BCG | MBA - Stanford GSB) Abhishek Goyal (ex-Accel Partners, Amazon | BTech - IIT Kanpur)
column11: SAAS Product Sales, B2B, Sales, Inside Sales, Saas Sales, B2B Sales, Software Sales, Enterprise Sales, Software Solution Sales

column2: Position Overview: ICA Edu Skills is seeking a dynamic and motivated Field Sales Executive with 2-5 years of experience in sales. The ideal candidate will be responsible for promoting our educational programs and services to potential clients, building strong relationships with stakeholders, and driving sales growth in their assigned territory. Key Responsibilities: Prospecting and Lead Generation:  Identify and pursue new business opportunities by visiting educational institutions, corporate offices, and other potential clients. Client Relationship Management:  Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing and prospective clients to understand their needs and provide suitable educational solutions. Sales Presentations:  Conduct presentations and demonstrations of ICA Edu Skills programs to potential clients, effectively communicating the value and benefits of our offerings. Negotiation and Closing Deals: Negotiate terms and conditions with clients to close sales and achieve revenue targets. Market Research:  Stay updated with market trends, competitor activities, and industry developments to identify new opportunities and threats. Reporting and Documentation:  Maintain accurate records of sales activities, client interactions, and pipeline status. Prepare regular reports for management review. Collaboration:  Work closely with the marketing team to align sales strategies with promotional campaigns. Coordinate with the customer service team to ensure a seamless client experience. Travel:  Travel within the assigned territory to meet with clients and attend industry events as necessary. Qualifications: Experience:  2-5 years of proven sales experience, preferably in the education or training sector. Education:  Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. Skills   - Strong communication and interpersonal skills.   - Ability to build and maintain relationships with clients.   - Excellent negotiation and closing skills.   - Self-motivated with a results-driven approach.   - Proficiency in MS Office and CRM software.  Benefits: - Competitive salary and performance-based incentives. - Opportunities for professional growth and development. - Supportive work environment with a focus on teamwork and innovation. - Health insurance and other standard benefits.

You can always enjoy walking right into a marsh if you re looking for an exotic flower or taking a bungee jump down a dormant volcano if you love the adrenaline rush it gives you! It is all about following your heart even when the world wants you to follow convention.  It is about doing the trapeze without the net to break your fall. It s a place our team members inundate us with their thoughts and give the phrase taking on challenges a new meaning; which is why our style of working is completely transparent.  There is only one life and if you care if make it worthwhile by following your passion then come join us. column2: We are seeking an Inside Sales Specialist to join our dynamic sales team based out of India! The Inside Sales Specialist will represent our US client/partner, Serigor Inc. ( https://www.serigor.com ), and be responsible for outbound sales, prospecting, generating and qualifying new leads, and moving them through the sales pipeline.  The position requires working the night shift/US Shift (7 PM-4 AM IST), and candidates must be comfortable with these hours. Ideal candidates may work Hybrid or Onsite, and local candidates are preferred. Our office is located in West Delhi, Janakpuri, New Delhi 110018. Responsibilities: Generate new business via cold calling CXO individuals across North America Follow up on inbound marketing leads Sell/Upsell/Cross-sell IT Solutions and IT Staffing services to new and existing clients Deliver an unparalleled customer experience by resolving customer issues promptly Generate and maintain a list of potential clients regularly Work with geographically dispersed team members Generate leads through LinkedIn Sales Navigator and email campaigns Manage social media such as Facebook, LinkedIn, and Twitter Requirements: Willingness to work the night shift/US Shift Minimum 2-6 years of experience in Inside Sales or Lead Generation Bachelor's degree in Business, Commerce, Marketing, or related field. MBA in Sales and Marketing highly preferred Excellent written/verbal communication and presentation skills Strong interpersonal, conversational, and active listening skills to build a rapport with potential clients Highly motivated, energetic, and outgoing Ability to work individually and as a team member Ability to work on multiple tasks with global team members Some experience using tools like ZoomInfo, Sales Navigator, RainKing, DiscoverOrg, Zoho, etc.

column2: A salesperson, often referred to as a sales representative or sales associate, is an individual who is responsible for promoting and selling products or services to customers     Salespeople play a crucial role in driving revenue and building customer relationships for a company     They typically work in retail stores, showrooms, or offices, and may also engage in field sales by visiting clients or prospects     The responsibilities and tasks of a salesperson include:Customer Interaction: Engaging with customers to understand their needs, preferences, and purchase intent     Salespeople must actively listen, ask questions, and provide relevant information about products or services to assist customers in making informed buying decisions     Product Knowledge: Developing a comprehensive understanding of the products or services offered by the company     Salespeople should be able to effectively communicate the features, benefits, and value proposition of the offerings to potential customers     Sales Presentations and Demonstrations: Conducting product demonstrations or delivering sales presentations to showcase the features and functionality of the products or services     This may involve explaining product specifications, demonstrating how they work, and addressing any concerns or objections raised by customers     Lead Generation and Prospecting: Identifying and pursuing potential customers or leads     Salespeople may use various methods, such as cold calling, networking, referrals, or online lead generation techniques, to find new prospects and expand the customer base     Sales Negotiation and Closing: Negotiating pricing, terms, and conditions with customers to reach mutually beneficial agreements     Salespeople are responsible for closing sales and completing transactions, which may involve handling contracts, processing payments, and arranging for product delivery or service activation     Relationship Building: Developing and maintaining strong relationships with customers to foster loyalty and repeat business     Salespeople often follow up with customers after the sale, address any issues or concerns, and provide ongoing support to build long-term relationships     Sales Target Achievement: Meeting or exceeding sales targets and quotas set by the company     Salespeople are responsible for achieving individual and team sales goals, and they may be required to track their sales activities and report progress to sales managers or supervisors     Market Research and Competitive Analysis: Staying informed about industry trends, customer preferences, and competitive offerings     Salespeople may gather market intelligence, analyze competitor strategies, and provide feedback to the company regarding market trends or customer needs
column11: product demonstration, showroom, cold calling, relationship building, customer relationship, product sales, sales activities, price negotiation, sales, retail, field sales, target achievement, market intelligence, online lead generation, selling, demonstration

column2: Identifying Prospective Clients: Identifying and targeting potential clients through various channels, such as cold calling, referrals, social media, and networking events.     Building Relationships: Establishing and building relationships with prospective clients by understanding their business needs, requirements, and pain points, and proposing relevant technology solutions and services.     Sales Pitch: Preparing and delivering compelling sales pitches that articulate the value proposition of the technology solutions and services being offered, and addressing any objections or concerns that prospective clients may have.     Closing Deals: Closing sales by negotiating pricing, contract terms, and service level agreements, and ensuring that the client is satisfied with the proposed solution and service.     Managing Accounts: Managing and growing existing client accounts by providing ongoing support, cross-selling and upselling additional products and services, and ensuring that client needs are met and expectations are exceeded.     Market Analysis: Conducting market research and analysis to stay up-to-date on technology trends, competitive landscape, and industry best practices, and using this information to inform sales strategies and tactics.

column2: Do you want a change from writing test cases,  typing code,  writing reams of document.  Here is an opportunity for you.  We have openings for sales engineering positions.  Sales engineering calls for the application of engineering knowledge to the sale of technical products.  Sales Engineers will work closely with the sales team and help the sales team with customer engagements like showing demos,  building POCs,  troubleshooting customers' problems via web demos,  answering support questions,  etc.  They retain their skills of engineering and use them in the area of sales.  They act as a bridge between the customer and the engineering team.  They play a vital role in product management by providing feedback to the Engineering team on the kinds of features that customers would love to see in the product.  Job Requirements/ Qualifications     Comprehensive networking knowledge     Excellent interpersonal,  communication,  and product presentation skills     A minimum of 1- 2 years of experience in software product marketing/ customer relations.  People who have spent 1-2 years in a technical call center can also apply.      If you don't have experience in marketing and customer relations,  you can still apply,  provided you have spent 1-2 years in software development and have flair for marketing and customer relations. column2: Lead Generation:  Identifying and researching potential leads that can be contacted for selling products or services. This often involves using customer databases, internet resources, and market research. Cold Calling:  Making unsolicited calls to potential dealers. This is a significant part of a job, involving reaching out to people who have not expressed prior interest in the product or service. Product Promotion:  Informing potential or existing dealers about the features, advantages, and availability of products or services. This requires a deep understanding of what they're selling to effectively answer questions and overcome objections. Sales:  Convincing dealers to purchase products or services over the phone. This involves negotiation skills and the ability to close deals effectively. Customer Relationship Management (CRM):  Using CRM software to manage dealers / customer information, document call details, and follow up on leads. This ensures a personalized approach to each customer and helps in tracking the sales process. Meeting Sales Targets:  Telemarketing officers are often given sales targets they need to meet within a specific timeframe. Their performance is usually evaluated based on these targets. Feedback Collection:  Gathering feedback from customers about products, services, or the telemarketing process itself. This feedback is vital for the company to improve its offerings and customer service. Market Research:  Participating in market research to understand customer preferences, market trends, and the effectiveness of marketing strategies. Reporting:  Providing reports on sales activities, customer feedback, and market research findings to superiors. This helps in strategic planning and decision-making. Compliance and Ethics:  Ensuring that all telemarketing activities comply with legal and ethical standards. This includes respecting customer preferences regarding unsolicited calls and protecting customer data privacy. Training and Development:  Continuously updating their knowledge of products, services, and sales techniques. Telemarketing officers may also be involved in training new team members.
column11: Good Convincing Skills, Product Sales, Sales Operations, Online Marketing, Sales Lead Generation, Sales Coordination, Online Sales, Sales Management, Marketing Support

column2: Deputy Programme Manager for Food Safety and Toxins Programme Deputy Programme Manager for Food Safety and Toxins Programme      Food Safety and Toxins Programme of the Centre for Science and Environment (CSE) is looking for an experienced candidate as a Deputy Programme Manager to work in the area of unhealthy/unsafe/bad food so that good foodgets promoted and made available. This would involve pushing for necessary regulations and creating awareness related to the following (but not limited to):        Packaged junk food/junk food which are ultra-processed and are high in salt, sugar or fat and are globally indicted for bad health/non-communicable diseases like obesity, hypertension and diabetes. This would involve following aspects like (but not limited to):      Availability of junk food in schools and near by     Marketing / promotion / advertisement of junk food     Labelling of packaged food     Chemicals/toxins/pesticides due to contamination/adulteration in different kinds of food         Job profile:           The candidate is expected to manage and lead the policy research, advocacy, communication and capacity building efforts to push for the objectives of the programme. The job will entail research, writing policy papers; communicating through write-ups and articles; and interacting with stakeholders policy makers and regulators in different government ministries/departments, scientific and medical community, media, industry, and NGOs to push for change.      The research would include collection, analysis and synthesis of data/information from secondary and primary sources. The job would also require coordination with CSE s environment, monitoring laboratory (EML), writing for    Down To Earth   , CSE s fortnightly magazine, and attending to media queries. The advocacy campaign will include building networks, making presentations and organizing and participating in meetings and conferences. The candidate should be open to travel within and outside India. The candidate is expected to work independently and also manage other responsibilities or resource in the team, if required.      At least 5-7 years of relevant work experience is desired.    Candidates with lesser experience will be considered for junior positions   . Preference will be given to:       Candidates with experience in pushing policymakers and advocating for change in the domains of public interest and public health.     Candidates with a background in science/life sciences         Necessary skills and expectations:       Strong and independent research and analytical skills     Writing skills technical reports and articles     Communication and networking skills     Hard working, self-motivated and disciplined work ethic

column2: This opening is for our office in Gurgaon,  India.   As an Engagement Manager you will be closely working with the Senior Management Team to lead practice development including project delivery in the Growth domain,  as well as solutioning and POC (proof of concept) development. You will need to collaborate with practice heads and VP- Operations to provide data- driven and analysis- rich deliverables deriving strategic insights as per the client requirements. Engagement Managers are expected to drive as well as assist with business development activities and provide thought leadership. Possess deep subject matter knowledge to lend additional credibility and add value at all stages and levels.  In addition,  you will be responsible for managing consulting team members as a career manager and be a key contributor to drive other organizational responsibilities.  You would typically be working on multiple projects,  responsible for end- to- end project delivery. You will need to ensure that we provide fact- based strategic and tactical insights to our clients. You will be working closely with your project teams to guide them to conduct in- depth secondary research and primary research,  apply analysis techniques and derive interesting and meaningful insights for our clients.  You may be required to travel within India/  overseas (typically emerging markets) for client meetings/  primary research.  Primary Responsibilities:   Manage projects from resource mobilization to first contact to final delivery and ensure adherence to scope,  timelines,  budgets,  quality standards,  and risk management to ensure customer delight  Demonstrate in- depth understanding of the practice area (Technology); provide thought leadership internally as well as to clients,  including overall guidance,  mentoring and supervision to the team  Coach team with respect to conducting primary and/ or secondary research and validate findings of team members  Review project plans as well as deliverables and validate insights and strategic recommendations by the teams. Ensure the teams are:   Validating the data obtained,  and analysingit to extract insights and identify patterns (qualitative as well as qualitative)  Developing proxies and triangulations for difficult- to- get data points  Identifying trends,  patterns and insights and applying them to arrive at solutions/  recommendations    Overall supervision and management of project -  ensuring project process adherence,  TATs and compliance standards  Over- manage client communication process including understanding requirements,  expectation management and delivering quality outputs  Manage partner relationships (as applicable)  Manage and deepen client relationships,  also identify further business opportunities with existing clients    Actively contribute to the business development process,  support sales teams in closing deals by participating in client calls and pitching solutions  Design solutions based on clients requirements; define engagement structure including resource requirements,  project travel,  effort estimates and proposal pricing strategies  Develop proof of concept of the solution (if required)    Work with Senior Management Teams to define practices vision and mission  Assist in development and building of the practice team  Collaborate with senior management in development and enhancement of knowledge nuggets and thought pieces,  methodologies and frameworks,  website content development,  etc. Also build sales collaterals such as whitepapers and capability decks  Monitor competitor activity and competitor strategies to benchmark firms performance and identify improvement areas  Manage practice specific vendors (database vendors,  primary research partners etc.)    Career manager for the consulting team  Lead and motivate all resources in the team,  define their career goals and progression,  retention management,  including practice specific training and development initiatives  Actively participating in organization- building activities such as hiring,  process improvement tracking,  growing client accounts,  etc.  Required Skills Personal Attributes:   Excellent business writing and verbal communication skills including presentation skills  Extremely detail- oriented with high standards for written and visual presentation of information as well as idea  Excellent research,  analytical,  and numerical skills  Ability to develop and articulate strategic recommendations based on rigorous data analysis  Ability to partner with BD teams to understand client problems and marketing strategies; should have Business Development acumen and ability to identify Business Development opportunities   High degree of proficiency in MS Office Suite (PowerPoint,  Word,  Excel etc.)  Strong inter- personal skills,  ability to work with teams in a time- line driven high pressure environment (typical of consulting firms)  Should be hands- on with exceptional execution/ delivery capabilities   Process orientation and high level of comfort with usage as well as customization of Technology tools  The candidate should be able to lead client engagements at CXO as well as lower levels  Self- driven with a high level of motivation and energy; a strong can do attitude; ability and willingness to work in a small and fast growing set- up  Ability to pro- actively identify ways to contribute to firms goals mission  International experience will be an added advantage  Professional appearance as well as manner of speaking   Corporate Strategy professional in large technology company OR  Market Intelligence/  Competitor Intelligence professional in large technology company  Studying evolving technology trends and business model shifts in the industry  Following large technology companies and their product/  solution strategies  Following Mergers Acquisition activity in technology industry and understanding its implications  Advising on product/  services strategy or go- to- market strategy or business model design etc. for technology companies  Understanding changing customer needs and its implications on technology industry    Bachelors degree (Engineering/  Commerce/  Economics) from a top- tier university (such as IITs,  NITs,  DU,  etc.); And an MBA from one of the top institutions in India /  abroad
column11: Data analysis, Business Development Manager, Analytical, collaterals, Consulting, Market intelligence, Tools, Resource mobilization, cxo, Risk management

column2: Senior Analyst, Data Analytics       We are looking for experienced analysts to join our Analytics team and help drive the understanding, growth, and success of the product. The right candidates will have deep technical skills to complement their analytical experience and will be comfortable working with a nascent data infrastructure to identify, monitor, and impact key metrics and help us make better decisions. They will be scrappy, independent, and excited about having a big impact from a new team.     Responsibilities:     - Use data to inform and influence the direction of the product team roadmaps and inform business decisions.       - Partner with product teams to define goals and identify key metrics for existing features and new releases.       - Work closely with Product, Engineering, and Marketing to rapidly design experiments and iterate on results.       - Improve our understanding of patterns/trends in user behavior and find new product opportunities.       - Build automated dashboards and reports to drive awareness and understanding of key metrics and experiment results.       - Work closely with Data Engineering to author and develop core data sets to empower operational and exploratory analyses.     Requirements:     - A proven track record of using quantitative analysis to impact key business or product decisions.       - The ability to clearly and effectively communicate the results of complex analyses.       - Minimum of 4 years experience writing production datasets in SQL/Hive OR building internal/production data tools for experimentation, or exploration in a scripting language (Python, PHP, Ruby, etc.).       - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.       - A solid grasp of common statistical applications and methods (experimentation, probabilities, regression).       - Comfort with basic HTML/CSS/JS.       - Academic and/or professional experience in a quantitative field.       - Experience in software engineering a plus.       - Experience in predictive modeling in big data environment is a plus.
column11: Outbound, Public relations, Product engineering, Analytical, Billing, PHP, Information retrieval, Customer support, Analytics, SQL

column2: Job Description      Chemical companies are striving to be solution providers in an industry that is seeing a rapid transformation from being product - centric to market - facing. Data - driven segmentation is an ideal starting point for the transformation. GadflyZone partners with chemical companies to accelerate this transformation. With deep domain expertise on the one hand, and passion for data sciences and technology on the other, we are here to deliver solid value and growth.      Does this combination of machine learning, technology and industry value, stir your passion Do get in touch. We need ace problem solvers at the intersection of chemical engineering, data sciences and software development to deliver domain - specific value using algorithms and heuristics.        Responsibilities:    You would be responsible for understanding and designing a solution for the industrial marketing and strategy problem, for specific customers, using subject matter expertise and data sciences. This would consist of understanding the customer problem and working with the engineering team to build the solution. Further, you would own the process of constantly refining the overall solution towards better customer experience. Typical aspects of ownership would include:        Understanding the problem and designing the solution flow  -  defining scope and requirements, isolating key issues, reviewing possible solutions, and presenting a recommendation          Designing the strategy for solving the customer problem          Working with engineers to identify the model for solving the problem          Identifying and munging the required data          Running the models with real data, and analyzing the results with techniques such as simulations and what - if analysis          Analyzing the results and zeroing in on the insights and recommendations          Owning the customer problem to complete delivery      Requirements:      Problem Solver (This is Key!)          Understanding, and more importantly a passion for, chemistry and the chemicals domain          Understanding of the industrial value chains, especially in chemicals and materials          Passionate towards direct customer value          Basic foundation in Statistical Learning, with passion for data based decision making          Expertise in comprehensive problem solving, all the way from problem definition to the final customer solution          Knowledgeable in software products that have the potential to meet business needs          Ability to work with customers to identify core requirements, total budget and timeline, project resources and expectations          Good communication and customer relationship skills      Educational Qualifications:      Bachelor's or Master's in Chemical Engineering or Material Science      Nice to have:      Industrial marketing analysis experience in the chemicals, polymers and materials domain          Experience in solving real life problems in the chemicals, polymers and materials domain          Rudimentary programming experience      Perks:      Fun and Solid work environment          Real Startup, Real Day1, Real Value Addition            Purpose    and    Autonomy    from day 1, leading to    Mastery
column11: Marketing analysis, Chemical, Material science, Chemical engineering, Machine learning, Customer relationship, HTML, Subject matter expertise, Customer experience, Industrial marketing

typically works in the banking, financial services, or customer service industry      The primary responsibility of a Relationship Executive is to manage and nurture relationships with clients or customers      The specific job duties may vary depending on the industry and company, but generally include:Client Relationship Management:      Building and maintaining strong relationships with clients or customers Understanding their needs and requirements Customer Service:      Providing excellent customer service and addressing customer inquiries or concerns Resolving issues and ensuring customer satisfaction Sales and Cross-selling:      Identifying opportunities to cross-sell or upsell products or services to existing clients Achieving sales targets and contributing to revenue growth Communication:      Effectively communicating with clients through various channels, including in-person meetings, phone calls, and emails Product Knowledge:      Staying updated on the company's products or services Educating clients on new offerings and benefits Documentation:      Maintaining accurate and up-to-date records of client interactions Managing necessary paperwork and documentation related to client accounts Market Research:      Keeping abreast of industry trends and market conditions      Providing insights and feedback to the organization based on client interactions Risk Management:      Assessing and managing risks associated with client relationships Ensuring compliance with relevant regulations and policies Collaboration:      Collaborating with other departments such as sales, marketing, and operations to meet client needs effectively Reports and Analysis:      Generating reports on client satisfaction, sales performance, and other relevant metrics Analyzing data to identify areas for improvement and growth

column2: We are largest consumer Electronics Company in Africa having operations in more than 18 countries in Africa..We are established & well organised company in Africa ......We are hiring Sales Executives for Tanzania and Uganda -East Africa.....Contact me for any clarifications at   9841040044...   Role & responsibilities     The Sales Executive  - Channels will be responsible for driving sales and expanding channel partnerships in Tanzania /Uganda. This role involves developing and maintaining relationships with key partners, identifying new sales opportunities, and ensuring the achievement of sales targets in the assigned regions. Key Responsibilities:Channel Sales Strategy: Develop and implement a comprehensive channel sales strategy for assigned country  Identify potential channel partners and evaluate their suitability. Establish and maintain strong relationships with existing and new channel partners. Sales Targets: Achieve sales targets and objectives for the assigned regions. Monitor and analyze sales performance and provide regular reports to the Sales Manager. Implement sales plans to meet monthly, quarterly, and annual targets. Partner Management: Train and support channel partners to ensure they have the necessary knowledge and tools to sell products effectively. Conduct regular meetings with partners to review performance, address issues, and plan for future growth. Provide timely and accurate product information, pricing, and promotions to partners. Market Analysis: Conduct market research to understand the competitive landscape and identify opportunities for growth. Gather feedback from partners and customers to inform product development and marketing strategies. Monitor industry trends and developments to stay ahead of the competition. Sales Support: Coordinate with internal teams (e.g., marketing, product development, customer service) to ensure seamless support for channel partners. Resolve any issues or conflicts that arise with channel partners. Assist in the development of marketing materials and sales tools to support channel partners. Reporting & Documentation: Maintain accurate records of all sales activities, partner interactions, and market information. Prepare and submit regular sales reports, forecasts, and analysis. Ensure compliance with company policies and procedures. Preferred candidate profile     Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. Minimum of 1-5 years of experience in channel sales or business development, preferably in the FMCG or Consumer Electronics/ Durable sector. Proven track record of achieving sales targets and managing channel partners. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). Willingness to travel frequently within the assigned regions. Key Competencies: Results-oriented with a strong sales acumen. Strategic thinker with the ability to identify and seize opportunities. Strong organizational and time management skills. Ability to build and maintain long-term relationships with partners. Adaptable and able to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Perks and benefits     Excellent Savings +Local Salary + Furnished Accommodation+ Transport + Performance Bonus +Yearly Leave & Passage

Scope - Plan daily sales calls and visiting customers according to sales schedule.  - Attend to customers call & follow-up sales enquiries or quality issues. - Prepare quotations & material info for customers.  - Conduct product presentations and orientation to customers to improve their product knowledge. - Printer Sales - Sales Forecasting, Production and Shipment Planning. - Follow up on arrival, availability of stock and lead time, inform delivery schedule. - Follow up on the payment from customer in coordination with admin staff and monitor to ensure healthy cash flow. - Arranging for requisite documents from customer like PO, Tax Certificates etc. - Survey and collect market, competitors pricing and source of material information. - Recommend new products to customers. - Monitoring monthly sales to customers, attending sales meeting and support to customer for the quality issues.   Required Skills / Abilities - Excellent written and verbal communication skills - Excellent organizational and time management skills - Excellent operational skills of Microsoft Office - Candidate should be knowledgeable of B2B Sales.   Working Conditions Working days & hours: basically 5 days a week (Mon to Fri) from 9:30 to 18:00 (Lunch break 13:30-14:00) Day-off: basically Saturdays, Sundays and official holidays as per company calendar (10 days in a year) Fringe benefit: group medical insurance based on our policy.

column2: Our school is seeking a dedicated and dynamic Admission Officer to join our admissions team. As an Admission Officer, you will play a vital role in attracting, evaluating, and enrolling qualified students who align with our schools mission and values.       Responsibilities:       Manage the end-to-end admissions process, from initial inquiry to enrollment, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience for prospective students and their families.     Respond promptly and professionally to inquiries from prospective students, parents, and guardians, providing accurate information about our schools programs, admission requirements, and application procedures.     Conduct interviews, assessments, and evaluations of prospective students to assess their suitability for admission.     Collaborate with faculty, staff, and administrators to review and evaluate applications, considering academic performance, extracurricular involvement, personal statements, and recommendation letters.     Participate in recruitment events, including open houses, school fairs, and information sessions, both on and off-campus, to attract prospective students and promote our institution.     Build and maintain strong relationships with feeder schools, educational consultants, and other stakeholders to enhance the schools visibility and attract qualified candidates.     Stay updated with industry trends, best practices, and changes in admission policies and procedures.     Prepare reports and maintain accurate records related to admissions, including applicant data, acceptance rates, and enrollment statistics.     Assist in the orientation and onboarding of new students and their families.       Qualifications:           A bachelors degree in any stream or a related field. A masters degree is preferred.     Previous experience in admissions, student recruitment, or a related field is highly desirable.     Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to engage and build rapport with diverse individuals and groups.     Familiarity with educational systems, admission requirements, and enrollment procedures.     A commitment to providing exceptional customer service to prospective students and their families.     Flexibility to work occasional evenings and weekends for recruitment events and admissions-related activities
